    Filesystem

    Create Filesystem

    Description Create a filesystem
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Setting / extending lock expiry for a datasetType will prevent any user from deleting it and releasing its capacity until 'lockExpiresAt' UTC
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/filesystems
    URL Parameters none
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "atime_mode": "NOATIME", 
    "pool_id": 1000, 
    "name": "auto-filesystem--1bd6cea3-", 
    "provtype": "THIN", 
    "size": 1000000000
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "_is_established": true, 
        "cg_name": null, 
        "_cg_snapshot_guid": null, 
        "rmr_target": false, 
        "updated_at": 1639516098299, 
        "pool_id": 1000, 
        "lock_state": "UNLOCKED", 
        "suspend_state": "NONE", 
        "qos_policy_name": null, 
        "serial": "111222", 
        "id": 1001, 
        "atime_granularity": 0, 
        "size": 1000013824, 
        "ssd_enabled": true, 
        "parent_id": 0, 
        "snapdir_name": ".snapshot", 
        "_reclaimed_snapshot_remote_system_serial": null, 
        "compression_suppressed": null, 
        "is_consistent": true, 
        "snapdir_accessible": true, 
        "visible_in_snapdir": false, 
        "type": "MASTER", 
        "qos_shared_policy_id": null, 
        "_cg_guid": null, 
        "pool_name": "auto-pool--a0c79922-72fa-4", 
        "used": 0, 
        "mobility_source": null, 
        "tree_allocated": 0, 
        "replication_types": [
            "NONE"
        ], 
        "has_children": false, 
        "atime_mode": "NOATIME", 
        "lock_expires_at": null, 
        "cg_id": null, 
        "data": 1001, 
        "provtype": "THIN", 
        "qos_policy_id": null, 
        "rmr_snapshot_guid": null, 
        "capacity_savings": null, 
        "name": "auto-filesystem--1bd6cea3-", 
        "qos_shared_policy_name": null, 
        "data_snapshot_guid": null, 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516098299, 
        "modified": true, 
        "compression_enabled": true, 
        "family_id": 1001, 
        "depth": 0, 
        "dataset_type": "FILESYSTEM", 
        "nfs_filesystem_id": 1, 
        "write_protected": false, 
        "mapped": false, 
        "replica_ids": [], 
        "allocated": 0, 
        "rmr_source": false, 
        "rmr_active_active_peer": false, 
        "num_blocks": 1953152
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    MISSING_FIELD HTTP 400 A field ('size') is missing in an object passed
    INVALID_CHARACTERS_IN_NAME HTTP 400 Invalid characters in name '..'
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa) of parameter 'snapdir_name' does not meet a condition: 'size must be between 1 and 255'
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('size')
    USER_IS_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 User 'auto-POOL_ADMIN-d0751339-1' is forbidden to modify pool 'auto-pool--5179289a-1c27-4'
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Setting / extending lock expiry for a snapshot will prevent any user from deleting it and releasing its capacity until '2021-12-19 23:23:20' UTC
    FILESYSTEM_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Filesystem not found
    FILESYSTEM_IS_SUSPENDED HTTP 409 The operation cannot be performed as the filesystem is suspended ('auto-filesystem--e4f5d469-')
    FILESYSTEM_FAMILY_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 A new filesystem family cannot be created. The system has reached the maximum number of filesystem families
    INVALID_FILESYSTEM_ROOT_MODE HTTP 409 Invalid filesystem root mode 'bad value'
    REPLICA_INCONSISTENT_DATASETS HTTP 409 Taking a snapshot cannot be completed because at least one dataset has not reached a consistent state
    FILESYSTEM_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 An entity with this name already exists
    FILESYSTEM_NAME_EQUALS_TO_SNAPDIR HTTP 409 Filesystem name '.MySnapDir' cannot be identical to the name of the filesystem's snapshot directory or to the default snapshot directory name
    CANNOT_TAKE_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 Cannot take a snapshot due to a background process. Please retry later
    CANNOT_CREATE_WRITABLE_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 A snapshot of a replica target cannot be write-enabled when created
    DATASET_MIN_CAPACITY HTTP 409 The requested filesystem size is less than the minimum filesystem size: 1GB
    WRITABLE_LOCKED_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 A snapshot cannot be both writable and locked
    ILLEGAL_POOL_TYPE HTTP 409 Cannot create a FILESYSTEM fs in vVol pool storage container, because it is dedicated for VMware vVols
    ATIME_GRANULARITY_BELOW_MIN_LIMIT HTTP 409 Cannot create a filesystem with an atime_granularity lower than 3600
    MAX_TREE_DEPTH HTTP 409 Tree depth limit reached
    DATASET_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 The request exceeds the dataset count limit
    NAS_DISABLED HTTP 409 Cannot perform operation when NAS is disabled
    INTERNAL_PATH_NOT_DIR HTTP 409 Internal path '/i/am/internal/path' is not a directory within filesystem 'auto-filesystem--faeb580d-'
    INVALID_LOCK_DURATION HTTP 409 Lock expiry cannot exceed 365 days
    INVALID_LOCK_EXPIRY HTTP 409 Lock expiry date has to be in the future
    REPLICA_ALREADY_RECLAIMED HTTP 409 The entity requested is a replication staging area and has already been reclaimed with name auto-filesystem--634ebf0a-
    FILESYSTEM_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 A new filesystem cannot be created. The system has reached the maximum number of filesystems
    INVALID_LOCK_ENTITY_TYPE HTTP 409 Locking filesystem is not allowed
    MAX_FAMILY_SIZE HTTP 409 Filesystem family size limit reached

    Delete Filesystem

    Description Delete a filesystem
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    The entity 'volume_name' will be deleted. The data that is stored on the entity will be lost with no way to recover it
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/filesystems/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the filesystem to delete
    force_if_snapshot_locked boolean force_if_snapshot_locked
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "_is_established": true, 
        "cg_name": null, 
        "_cg_snapshot_guid": null, 
        "rmr_target": false, 
        "updated_at": 1639516247656, 
        "pool_id": 1006, 
        "lock_state": "UNLOCKED", 
        "suspend_state": "NONE", 
        "qos_policy_name": null, 
        "serial": "111222", 
        "id": 1007, 
        "atime_granularity": 0, 
        "size": 1000013824, 
        "ssd_enabled": true, 
        "parent_id": 0, 
        "snapdir_name": ".snapshot", 
        "_reclaimed_snapshot_remote_system_serial": null, 
        "compression_suppressed": null, 
        "is_consistent": true, 
        "snapdir_accessible": true, 
        "visible_in_snapdir": false, 
        "type": "MASTER", 
        "qos_shared_policy_id": null, 
        "_cg_guid": null, 
        "pool_name": "auto-pool--d5f99f6d-f68d-4", 
        "used": 0, 
        "mobility_source": null, 
        "tree_allocated": 0, 
        "replication_types": [
            "NONE"
        ], 
        "has_children": false, 
        "atime_mode": "NOATIME", 
        "lock_expires_at": null, 
        "cg_id": null, 
        "data": 1007, 
        "provtype": "THICK", 
        "qos_policy_id": null, 
        "rmr_snapshot_guid": null, 
        "capacity_savings": null, 
        "name": "falsefalse", 
        "qos_shared_policy_name": null, 
        "data_snapshot_guid": null, 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516246920, 
        "modified": true, 
        "compression_enabled": true, 
        "family_id": 1007, 
        "depth": 0, 
        "dataset_type": "FILESYSTEM", 
        "nfs_filesystem_id": 5, 
        "write_protected": false, 
        "mapped": false, 
        "replica_ids": [], 
        "allocated": 0, 
        "rmr_source": false, 
        "rmr_active_active_peer": false,

    Errors

    REPLICATED_DATASET_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 A replicated filesystem cannot be deleted. Remove the replication, then delete the filesystem
    DELETE_SNAPSHOT_WITH_LOCKED_DESCENDANTS HTTP 409 Snapshot 'auto-filesystem--34ca4f1f-' has locked descendants, and can only be deleted after they expire, on: '2021-12-19 23:18:57' UTC
    ENTITY_ASSIGNED_TO_QOS HTTP 409 The filesystem 'auto-filesystem--118bac9f-' is assigned to QoS policy 'auto-QoSPolicy4Test-6b55a1' and cannot be deleted
    FILESYSTEM_HAS_EXPORT HTTP 409 The filesystem cannot be deleted. Filesystem 'auto-filesystem--4c501cef-' has active export(s)
    DELETE_LOCKED_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 Snapshot 'snap' is locked, and can only be deleted after '2021-12-19 23:18:52' UTC
    CHILD_FILESYSTEMS_HAVE_EXPORTS HTTP 409 The filesystem 'auto-filesystem--390903b7-' cannot be deleted. One or more of its children have active export(s)

    Delete Simulation

    Description Return an estimate of the reclaimed space in case of filesystem deletion
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/filesystems/delete_simulation
    URL Parameters none
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data

    "entities": [
        1001, 
        1002
    ]

    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "valid": true, 
        "space_reclaimable": 0
    }, 
    "error": null

    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Get all Filesystems

    Description Return a filtered and sorted list of filesystems.
    Filterable and Sortable fields:atime_granularity,atime_mode,_cg_guid,_cg_snapshot_guid,compression_enabled,is_consistent,created_at,data_snapshot_guid,dataset_type,depth,_is_established,family_id,nfs_filesystem_id,id,lock_expires_at,mapped,mobility_source,name,provtype,_reclaimed_snapshot_remote_system_serial,rmr_active_active_peer,rmr_snapshot_guid,rmr_source,rmr_target,serial,size,snapdir_accessible,snapdir_name,ssd_enabled,suspend_state,type,updated_at,write_protected.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/filesystems
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true,

    Refresh a Filesystem Snapshot

    Description Refresh a filesystem snapshot
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Refreshing entity 'dataset_name' will overwrite its cg_membersdata
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/filesystems/{id}/refresh
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the target snapshot
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "source_id": 1003
}
    Returns

    INVALID_OPERATION_ON_LOCKED_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 This operation is not allowed on a locked snapshot until its lock expires
    REFRESH_TARGET_IS_RMR_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 The target is a replication snapshot
    ILLEGAL_POOL_STATE HTTP 409 Illegal pool state
    REFRESH_TARGET_HAS_CHILDREN HTTP 409 The target that is provided for this operation has children
    REFRESH_TARGET_NOT_DIRECT_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 The target that is provided for this operation is not a direct snapshot of the source
    FILESYSTEM_IS_SUSPENDED HTTP 409 The operation cannot be performed as the filesystem is suspended ('auto-filesystem--c648a80e-')
    REFRESH_TARGET_NOT_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 The target that is provided for this operation is not a snapshot

    Restore a Filesystem

    Description Restore a filesystem from one of its snapshots
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Restoring datasets will overwrite their data
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/filesystems/{id}/restore
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the target filesystem
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    "1002"
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": true, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Restoring datasets will overwrite their data
    REPLICATED_DATASET_RESTORE_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 Replicated filesystem cannot be restored
    ILLEGAL_RESTORE_REQUEST HTTP 409 Dataset cannot be restored. auto-filesystem--ca05335c- is not a descendant of auto-filesystem--e1164660-
    ILLEGAL_FS_RESTORE_REQUEST HTTP 409 Filesystem cannot be restored. auto-filesystem--2763b444- is not a direct snapshot of auto-filesystem--5b907a43-
    FILESYSTEM_IS_SUSPENDED HTTP 409 The operation cannot be performed as the filesystem is suspended ('auto-filesystem--b9599d6b-')
    INVALID_OPERATION_ON_LOCKED_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 This operation is not allowed on a locked snapshot until its lock expires
    PROTECTED_DATASET_CANNOT_BE_RESTORED HTTP 409 A dataset (auto-filesystem--d2f95ff4-) that is write-protected cannot be restored

    Update a Filesystem Attribute

    Description Update an attribute of a filesystem. For example: set the filesystem capacity to be compressed by setting the value of compression_enabled to yes
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Unlocking a datasetType should only be done after the customer signs a release form
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/filesystems/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of filesystem to update
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data

    "size": 10737418240
}

    WRITE_ENABLE_LOCKED_SNAPSHOT HTTP 409 Snapshot 'snap' is locked, and can only be write-enabled after '2021-12-21 23:18:25' UTC
    SNAPSHOT_LOCK_FORBIDDEN HTTP 409 Snapshot 'snap' cannot be further locked as it is write-enabled
    SNAP_RESIZE_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 A write-protected snapshot cannot be resized
    FILESYSTEM_RESIZE_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 A write-protected filesystem cannot be resized

    INVALID_LOCK_EXPIRY HTTP 409 Lock expiry date has to be in the future
    ATIME_GRANULARITY_BELOW_MIN_LIMIT HTTP 409 Cannot create a filesystem with an atime_granularity lower than 3600
    REPLICA_NOT_ALLOWED_ON_TARGET HTTP 409 This operation can only be performed on the source side of the replica
    FILESYSTEM_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 An entity with this name already exists
    FILESYSTEM_NAME_EQUALS_TO_SNAPDIR HTTP 409 Filesystem name '.MySnapDir' cannot be identical to the name of the filesystem's snapshot directory or to the default snapshot directory name
    FILESYSTEM_SUSPEND_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 Suspending a filesystem auto-replica-fs--9f5c5b60- is not allowed. The filesystem is a target replica
    LOCK_EXPIRY_TOO_SHORT HTTP 409 The lock expiry of snapshot 'snap' cannot be lowered. Current expiry time is '2021-12-19 23:18:25' UTC
    DATASET_SHRINKING_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 filesystem size cannot be reduced
    FILESYSTEM_IS_SUSPENDED HTTP 409 The operation cannot be performed as the filesystem is suspended ('auto-filesystem--39258a34-')

    Host Cluster

    Add a Host to a Cluster

    Description Add a host to a cluster.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/clusters/{id}/hosts
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the cluster
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "id": 1000
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "luns": [], 
        "name": "auto-Cluster4Test-edb87e11", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516206578, 
        "host_type": "DEFAULT", 
        "updated_at": 1639516206578, 
        "san_client_type": "CLUSTER", 
        "hosts": [
            {
                "luns": [], 
                "security_method": "NONE", 
                "security_chap_inbound_username": null, 
                "name": "auto-Host4Test-48f1f4cd-cb", 
                "tenant_id": 1, 
                "created_at": 1639516206374, 
                "host_type": "DEFAULT", 
                "updated_at": 1639516206374, 
                "id": 1000, 
                "san_client_type": "HOST", 
                "optimized": true, 
                "security_chap_has_outbound_secret": false, 
                "security_chap_has_inbound_secret": false, 
                "host_cluster_id": 1001, 
                "ports": [
                    {
                        "host_id": 1000, 
                        "type": "FC", 
                        "address": "aaaaaaaaaaaa0002"
                    }
                ], 
                "security_chap_outbound_username": null
            }
        ], 
        "id": 1001
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('foo')
    MALFORMED_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request content is malformed
    HOST_CLUSTER_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Cluster not found
    PORT_COUNT_CLUSTER_LIMIT HTTP 409 Port count limit reached for cluster
    HOST_ASSIGNED_TO_CLUSTER HTTP 409 Host is already assigned to a cluster
    HOST_EXISTS HTTP 409 Host already exists
    PRIVATE_LUNS_CONFLICT HTTP 409 Both cluster and host are mapped to the same volume
    MAPPINGS_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Total mappings count limit reached: 4
    OPENVMS_CLUSTER_UDID_EXISTS HTTP 409 UDID is not unique among cluster 'auto-Cluster4Test-61b2e1e2' mapped volumes
    CLUSTER_PROHIBITED_HOST_TYPE HTTP 409 The cluster cannot contain hosts of type DEFAULT
    HOST_COUNT_CLUSTER_LIMIT HTTP 409 Host count limit reached for cluster

    Add a LUN to a Cluster

    Description Add a LUN to a cluster.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Mapping a volume to more than one host or cluster may result in a host corrupting the other host's data. If the hosts belong to the same cluster, it is recommended to define them as a cluster in the system
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/clusters/{id}/luns
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the cluster
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "volume_id": 1001
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "udid": null, 
        "host_cluster_id": 1004, 
        "volume_id": 1001, 
        "clustered": true, 
        "host_id": 0, 
        "id": 178, 
        "lun": 11
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    USER_IS_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 User 'auto-POOL_ADMIN-437603c2-3' is forbidden to modify protocolEndpoint 'protocol_endpoint'
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Mapping a volume to more than one host or cluster may result in a host corrupting the other host's data. If the hosts belong to the same cluster, it is recommended to define them as a cluster in the system
    OPENVMS_MISSING_UDID HTTP 409 Mapping a volume without an assigned UDID is prohibited
    ILLEGAL_LUN HTTP 409 The LUN number passed is not in range
    VVOL_ALREADY_ENABLED_ON_CLUSTER HTTP 409 vVols is already enabled on cluster 'auto-Cluster4Test-cd2be71d'
    OPENVMS_HOST_UDID_EXISTS HTTP 409 UDID is not unique among host 'auto-Host4Test-839c31ad-9d' mapped volumes
    MAPPING_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 Volume 'auto-volume--8f0a1939-41af' is already mapped to a specific host 'auto-Host4Test-600ae38a-57' that is a member of cluster 'auto-Cluster4Test-57023911'
    LUN_AUTO_ASSIGNMENT_FAILURE HTTP 409 Failed auto-assigning LUN
    MAPPING_ALREADY_EXISTS HTTP 409 Volume 'auto-volume--e857e658-79e4' is already mapped to 'auto-Cluster4Test-18f810f7'
    OPERATION_NOT_SUPPORTED HTTP 409 Mapping a protocol endpoint to LUN=0 is not supported
    OPENVMS_CLUSTER_UDID_EXISTS HTTP 409 UDID is not unique among cluster 'auto-Cluster4Test-266eb9c3' mapped volumes
    ENABLE_VVOL_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 vVols is already enabled on host 'auto-Host4Test-a4790a4c-33' which is a member of the cluster 'auto-Cluster4Test-43ee3cd6'
    OPENVMS_LUN_CONTROLLER HTTP 409 Mapping to LUN=0 is prohibited

    Remove a Host from a Cluster

    Description Remove a host from a cluster.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Removing a host from a cluster causes the host to lose access to all of the volumes that are mapped to this cluster
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/clusters/{id}/hosts/{host_id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the cluster
    host_id long ID of the host
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "luns": [
            {
                "udid": null, 
                "host_cluster_id": 1003, 
                "volume_id": 1008, 
                "clustered": true, 
                "host_id": 0, 
                "id": 68, 
                "lun": 12
            }
        ], 
        "name": "auto-Cluster4Test-b32c9d3b", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516213472, 
        "host_type": "DEFAULT", 
        "updated_at": 1639516213472, 
        "san_client_type": "CLUSTER", 
        "hosts": [
            {
                "luns": [
                    {
                        "udid": null, 
                        "host_cluster_id": 1003, 
                        "volume_id": 1008, 
                        "clustered": true, 
                        "host_id": 1005, 
                        "id": 70, 
                        "lun": 12
                    }
                ], 
                "security_method": "NONE", 
                "security_chap_inbound_username": null, 
                "name": "auto-Host4Test-b8a263b2-93", 
                "tenant_id": 1, 
                "created_at": 1639516214155, 
                "host_type": "DEFAULT", 
                "updated_at": 1639516214155, 
                "id": 1005, 
                "san_client_type": "HOST", 
                "optimized": true, 
                "security_chap_has_outbound_secret": false, 
                "security_chap_has_inbound_secret": false, 
                "host_cluster_id": 1003, 
                "ports": [

                        "host_id": 1005, 
                        "type": "FC",

    Unmapping a Volume from a Cluster by LUN

    Description Unmap a volume from the cluster by pointing at the LUN ID.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Unmapping entity 'volume_name' may cause loss of access to the entity data
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/clusters/{id}/luns/lun/{lun_number}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the cluster
    lun_number int ID of the LUN
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "udid": 1234, 
        "host_cluster_id": 1001, 
        "volume_id": 1002, 
        "clustered": true, 
        "host_id": 0, 
        "id": 230, 
        "lun": 1
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Unmapping volume 'auto-volume--3335ab73-1d98' may cause loss of access to the volume data
    USER_IS_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 User 'auto-POOL_ADMIN-b0c13b25-7' is forbidden to modify protocolEndpoint 'protocol_endpoint'

    Host

    Add a Port to a Host

    Description Add a port to a host.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/hosts/{id}/ports
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the host
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "type": "fc", 
    "address": "aaaaaaaaaaaa0001"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "host_id": 1002, 
        "type": "FC", 
        "address": "aaaaaaaaaaaa0001"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    INVALID_IQN HTTP 400 The IQN value ' ' is not in the correct form, or contains invalid characters
    MISSING_FIELD HTTP 400 A field ('address') is missing in an object passed
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('') could not be translated to an expected type
    ISCSI_PORT_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 iSCSI port count limit reached
    PORT_COUNT_HOST_LIMIT HTTP 409 Port count limit reached for host
    CHAP_SECURITY_CONDITION_NOT_MET HTTP 409 Host auto-Host4Test-92e956ac-ee does not meet the security condition of MUTUAL_CHAP. Inbound and outbound CHAP secrets are missing
    PORT_ALREADY_BELONGS_TO_HOST HTTP 409 The port 'iqn.2011-08.com.example:storage' already belongs to host 'auto-Host4Test-184cebf1-ef'
    PORT_COUNT_CLUSTER_MEMBER_LIMIT HTTP 409 The host cannot be added to the cluster as the cluster's port count limit will be exceeded
    ISCSI_DISABLED HTTP 409 iSCSI is disabled, please contact INFINIDAT support to enable it

    Create a LUN for a Host

    Description Create a LUN for a host.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Mapping a volume to more than one host or cluster may result in a host corrupting the other host's data. If the hosts belong to the same cluster, it is recommended to define them as a cluster in the system
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/hosts/{id}/luns
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the host
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "volume_id": 1001
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "udid": null, 
        "host_cluster_id": 0, 
        "volume_id": 1001, 
        "clustered": false, 
        "host_id": 1002, 
        "id": 101, 
        "lun": 1
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    USER_IS_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 User 'auto-POOL_ADMIN-cad6a0d6-6' is forbidden to modify Default_Protocol_Endpoint 'protocol_endpoint'
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Mapping a volume to more than one host or cluster may result in a host corrupting the other host's data. If the hosts belong to the same cluster, it is recommended to define them as a cluster in the system
    VVOL_ALREADY_INHERITED HTTP 409 The host 'auto-Host4Test-5a305fb9-30' inherits access to vVols from the cluster it is a member of 'auto-Cluster4Test-b603fd51'
    LUN_AUTO_ASSIGNMENT_FAILURE HTTP 409 Failed auto-assigning LUN
    LUN_EXISTS HTTP 409 LUN already exists
    MAPPING_ALREADY_EXISTS HTTP 409 Volume 'auto-volume--613d37e3-ca3d' is already mapped to 'auto-Host4Test-16164a02-ec'
    ILLEGAL_LUN HTTP 409 The LUN number passed is not in range
    OPENVMS_MISSING_UDID HTTP 409 Mapping a volume without an assigned UDID is prohibited
    MAPPINGS_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Total mappings count limit reached: 4
    OPENVMS_LUN_CONTROLLER HTTP 409 Mapping to LUN=0 is prohibited
    MAPPING_ALREADY_INHERITED HTTP 409 Volume 'auto-volume--f2007e0a-7d00' is already mapped to Cluster 'auto-Cluster4Test-dc4fbe37'. (Host 'auto-Host4Test-39ed6dc8-c2' is a member of this cluster)
    OPERATION_NOT_SUPPORTED HTTP 409 Mapping a protocol endpoint to LUN=0 is not supported
    OPENVMS_HOST_UDID_EXISTS HTTP 409 UDID is not unique among host 'auto-Host4Test-e5d59df6-cc' mapped volumes

    Create an iSCSI Host With Mutual Security

    Description Create an iSCSI host with mutual CHAP security.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/hosts
    URL Parameters none
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "security_method": "MUTUAL_CHAP", 
    "security_chap_inbound_username": "hostuser987", 
    "name": "auto-HostTestName-da5f83b0", 
    "security_chap_outbound_username": "infiniuser987"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "luns": [], 
        "security_method": "MUTUAL_CHAP", 
        "security_chap_inbound_username": "hostuser987", 
        "name": "auto-HostTestName-da5f83b0", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516440927, 
        "host_type": "DEFAULT", 
        "updated_at": 1639516440927, 
        "id": 1001, 
        "san_client_type": "HOST", 
        "optimized": true, 
        "security_chap_has_outbound_secret": false, 
        "security_chap_has_inbound_secret": false, 
        "host_cluster_id": 0, 
        "ports": [], 
        "security_chap_outbound_username": "infiniuser987"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Create an iSCSI Host With Security

    Description Create an iSCSI host with CHAP security.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/hosts
    URL Parameters none
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "security_method": "CHAP", 
    "security_chap_inbound_username": "hostuser987", 
    "security_chap_inbound_secret": "hostsecret987654321", 
    "name": "auto-HostTestName-fa01a6ed"

        "ready": true
    },

        "luns": [], 
        "security_method": "CHAP", 
        "security_chap_inbound_username": "hostuser987", 
        "name": "auto-HostTestName-fa01a6ed", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516440817, 
        "host_type": "DEFAULT", 
        "updated_at": 1639516440817, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "san_client_type": "HOST", 
        "optimized": true, 
        "security_chap_has_outbound_secret": false, 
        "security_chap_has_inbound_secret": true, 
        "host_cluster_id": 0, 
        "ports": [], 
        "security_chap_outbound_username": null
    },

    Delete a Host

    Description Remove a host from the system.
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/hosts/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the host
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "luns": [], 
        "security_method": "NONE", 
        "security_chap_inbound_username": null, 
        "name": "auto-Host4Test-073a25b0-f3", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516281362, 
        "host_type": "DEFAULT", 
        "updated_at": 1639516281362, 
        "id": 1002, 
        "san_client_type": "HOST", 
        "optimized": true, 
        "security_chap_has_outbound_secret": false, 
        "security_chap_has_inbound_secret": false, 
        "host_cluster_id": 0, 
        "ports": [
            {
                "host_id": 1002, 
                "type": "FC", 
                "address": "aaaaaaaaaaaa000d"
            }
        ], 
        "security_chap_outbound_username": null
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    HOST_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Host not found
    CANNOT_DELETE_CLUSTERED_HOST HTTP 409 Cannot remove a host while it is assigned to a cluster
    HOST_NOT_EMPTY HTTP 409 Host has LUN mappings

    Delete a Port from a Host

    Description Delete a port from a host.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Removing the last port from a host causes the host to lose access to all of the volumes that are mapped to it
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/hosts/{id}/ports/{type}/{address}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the host
    type PortType The port type
    address String The port address
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "host_id": 1000, 
        "type": "FC", 
        "address": "aaaaaffaaa22aabb"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Removing the last port from a host causes the host to lose access to all of the volumes that are mapped to it
    PORT_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Port not found

    Delete LUN by Volume

    Description Unmap a volume from the host by pointing at the volume ID.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Disabling vVols may cause VMs running on hostName to lose access to their virtual disks
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/hosts/{id}/luns/volume_id/{volume_id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the host
    volume_id long ID of the volume
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "udid": null, 
        "host_cluster_id": 0, 
        "volume_id": 1001, 
        "clustered": false, 
        "host_id": 1000, 
        "id": 142, 
        "lun": 1
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Disabling vVols may cause VMs running on auto-Host4Test-4ade06b3-5b to lose access to their virtual disks
    USER_IS_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 User 'auto-POOL_ADMIN-309b62ff-f' is forbidden to modify Default_Protocol_Endpoint 'protocol_endpoint'
    VVOL_ALREADY_DISABLED_ON_HOST HTTP 409 vVols is already disabled on host 'auto-Host4Test-c0a75efa-30'

        "updated_at": 1639516180932, 
        "id": 1002, 
        "san_client_type": "HOST",

        "security_chap_has_inbound_secret": false,

    Get all Hosts

    Description Get all of the hosts in the system.
    Filterable and Sortable fields:security_method,security_chap_inbound_username,security_chap_outbound_username,created_at,id,name,optimized,host_type,updated_at.

    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 0, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [], 
    "error": null
}

    NOT_FILTERABLE_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains a field that cannot be filtered: ('luns')
    MAX_PAGE_SIZE_VIOLATION HTTP 400 Requested page size 1000000 exceeds range 1..1000 for command 'GetAllHostsFiltered'

    Unmapping a Volume from a Host Using the LUN ID

    Description Unmap a volume from the host by pointing at the LUN ID.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Unmapping entity 'volume_name' may cause loss of access to the entity data
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/hosts/{id}/luns/lun/{lun_number}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the host
    lun_number int ID of the LUN
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "udid": null, 
        "host_cluster_id": 0, 
        "volume_id": 1001, 
        "clustered": false, 
        "host_id": 1002, 
        "id": 101, 
        "lun": 1
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    USER_IS_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 User 'auto-POOL_ADMIN-12ead6e0-f' is forbidden to modify Default_Protocol_Endpoint 'protocol_endpoint'
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Unmapping volume 'auto-Volume1-0caba468-118d' may cause loss of access to the volume data
    LUN_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 LUN not found
    LUN_IS_CLUSTERED HTTP 409 A clustered LUN can be removed only from a Cluster

    Update Host

    Description Update the host attributes
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Modifying the host path optimized state may change the host's multipathing load-balancing behavior
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/hosts/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long The id of the host to update
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "security_chap_inbound_secret": "12s32112s3d234", 
    "security_chap_outbound_secret": "12s3d2312s3d23", 
    "security_method": "CHAP"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "luns": [], 
        "security_method": "CHAP", 
        "security_chap_inbound_username": null, 
        "name": "auto-Host4Test-34ad741e-13", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516431436, 
        "host_type": "DEFAULT", 
        "updated_at": 1639516431573, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "san_client_type": "HOST", 
        "optimized": true, 
        "security_chap_has_outbound_secret": true, 
        "security_chap_has_inbound_secret": true, 
        "host_cluster_id": 0, 
        "ports": [], 
        "security_chap_outbound_username": null
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    MALFORMED_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request content is malformed
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('host_cluster_id')
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('security_method') could not be translated to an expected type
    NOT_SUPPORTED_MULTIPLE_UPDATE HTTP 400 This resource does not support updating multiple fields in one request
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Modifying the host path optimized state may change the host's multipathing load-balancing behavior
    INVALID_CHAP_USERNAME HTTP 409 CHAP username cannot be accepted: CHAP username length has to be between 0 and 20 characters long
    OPENVMS_HOST_TYPE_NO_MODIFICATION HTTP 409 OpenVMS host type is set on creation only
    CHAP_SECURITY_CONDITION_NOT_MET HTTP 409 Host auto-Host4Test-c3b468d2-72 does not meet the security condition of MUTUAL_CHAP. Outbound CHAP secret is missing
    INVALID_CHAP_SECRET HTTP 409 CHAP secrets cannot be accepted: Must contain ASCII characters only

    Interface

    Add Port

    Description Add port described in the input json to interface
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    The possible maximum speed of the ports in the Port Group is not identical. To ensure the system is configured according to the best practices, make sure that all ports in the Port Group will run at the same speed or select other ports
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/network/interfaces/{id}/ports
    URL Parameters
    id long The id of the interface to add port to
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "name": "eth-kuku"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "name": "mltpl-eth", 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1595, 
        "state": "ENABLED", 
        "node_id": 1, 
        "internal_name": "N1L1", 
        "network_space_ids": [], 
        "type": "PORT_GROUP", 
        "ports": [
            {
                "name": "eth0"
            }, 
            {
                "name": "eth-kuku"
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    WRONG_PORT_ROLE HTTP 400 The port 'eth0' on node 1 is of the wrong role: Management
    NO_SUCH_PORT HTTP 400 Node 1 does not have a port 'eth-none'
    ILLEGAL_INTERFACE_NAME HTTP 400 Illegal interface name 'eth-interface-name-too-long'
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 The possible maximum speed of the ports in the Port Group is not identical. To ensure the system is configured according to the best practices, make sure that all ports in the Port Group will run at the same speed or select other ports
    PORT_BELONGS_TO_PORTGROUP HTTP 409 The port 'eth-kuku' on node 1 is already part of a port group
    INTERFACE_OPERATION_FAILED HTTP 409 The operation on interface failed. Please retry

    Create Interface

    Description Create interface
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    The possible maximum speed of the ports in the Port Group is not identical. To ensure the system is configured according to the best practices, make sure that all ports in the Port Group will run at the same speed or select other ports
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/network/interfaces
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "name": "i0cf3555b8-b2d7-4621-b2de-ecd82edfcbab-cf3555b8-b2d7-4621-b2de-ec", 
    "rate_limit": null, 
    "id": 0, 
    "node_id": 1, 
    "type": "PORT_GROUP", 
    "ports": [
        {
            "name": "eth-526cd14f-86"
        }
    ]
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "name": "i0cf3555b8-b2d7-4621-b2de-ecd82edfcbab-cf3555b8-b2d7-4621-b2de-ec", 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 47, 
        "state": "ENABLED", 
        "node_id": 1, 
        "internal_name": "N1L1", 
        "network_space_ids": [], 
        "type": "PORT_GROUP", 
        "ports": [
            {
                "name": "eth-526cd14f-86"
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NO_SUCH_PORT HTTP 400 Node 1 does not have a port 'eth-none'
    PORT_SPECIFIED_MULTIPLE_TIMES HTTP 400 A port (myPortName) can be used only once in a port group
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (0) of parameter 'vlan' does not meet a condition: 'must be greater than or equal to 1'
    INVALID_NAME_LENGTH HTTP 400 Name must be of length between 1 and 65 characters
    INVALID_CHARACTERS_IN_NAME HTTP 400 Invalid characters in name '$'
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('node_id')
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: Method is not allowed for READ_ONLY
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 The possible maximum speed of the ports in the Port Group is not identical. To ensure the system is configured according to the best practices, make sure that all ports in the Port Group will run at the same speed or select other ports
    INTERFACE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Invalid interface ID
    VLAN_ID_ALREADY_DEFINED_ON_INTERFACE HTTP 409 VLAN 1 is already defined on interface 'i-eth1'
    INTERFACES_PER_NODE_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 A new interface cannot be created on node 1. The system has reached the maximum number of interfaces per node: 1
    VLAN_INTERFACES_PER_NODE_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 A new VLAN interface cannot be created on node 1. The system has reached the maximum number of VLAN interfaces per node: 1
    PORT_BELONGS_TO_PORTGROUP HTTP 409 The port 'eth0' on node 1 is already part of a port group
    ILLEGAL_UNDERLYING_INTERFACE_TYPE HTTP 409 VLAN must be created on top of a port group
    NO_ACTIVE_PORTS_FOR_VLAN HTTP 409 Creating a VLAN on top of a port group requires at least one active port
    INTERFACE_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 An interface with this name already exists

    Delete Interface

    Description Delete single interface
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/network/interfaces/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long The id of the interface to delete
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "name": "v1", 
        "vlan": 1, 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "state": "ENABLED", 
        "node_id": 1, 
        "internal_name": "N1L1.1", 
        "network_space_ids": [], 
        "underlying_interface_id": 1625, 
        "type": "VLAN", 
        "id": 1626
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    INTERFACE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Invalid interface ID
    INTERFACE_IN_USE HTTP 409 The interface is in use by network space(s)
    CANNOT_DELETE_INTERFACE_WITH_VLANS HTTP 409 Interface 'i-eth1' has VLANs, please delete them first
    INTERFACE_IS_ENABLED HTTP 409 Enabled interface cannot be deleted. Please disable first

    Delete Port

    Description Remove port from interface
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/network/interfaces/{id}/ports/{name}
    URL Parameters
    id long The id of the interface
    name String The name of the port to remove from interface
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "name": "sngl-prt", 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1610, 
        "state": "ENABLED", 
        "node_id": 1, 
        "internal_name": "N1L1", 
        "network_space_ids": [], 
        "type": "PORT_GROUP", 
        "ports": [
            {
                "name": "eth0"
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    PORT_NOT_IN_PORTGROUP HTTP 404 Port 'eth9' not found in the port group
    CANNOT_DELETE_LAST_PORT_IN_PORTGROUP HTTP 409 Cannot delete last port in port group

    Disable Interface

    Description Disable interface
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Interface 'interfaceName' has VLANs. Disabling the interface will also disable these VLANs, and may cause any network space using them to become temporarily unavailable
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/network/interfaces/{id}/disable
    URL Parameters
    id long The id of the interface to disable
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "name": "i-eth1", 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1798, 
        "state": "DISABLED", 
        "node_id": 1, 
        "internal_name": "N1L1", 
        "network_space_ids": [], 
        "type": "PORT_GROUP", 
        "ports": [
            {
                "name": "eth1"
            }, 
            {
                "name": "eth0"
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Interface 'i-eth1' has VLANs. Disabling the interface will also disable these VLANs, and may cause any network space using them to become temporarily unavailable
    INTERFACE_IN_USE HTTP 409 The interface is in use by network space(s)
    OPERATION_NOT_SUPPORTED HTTP 409 Disabling a VLAN interface is not supported
    INTERFACE_ALREADY_DISABLED HTTP 409 Interface is already disabled

    Update Interface

    Description Update interface
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/network/interfaces/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long The id of the interface
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "name": "new_name"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "name": "new_name", 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1656, 
        "state": "ENABLED", 
        "node_id": 1, 
        "internal_name": "N1L1", 
        "network_space_ids": [], 
        "type": "PORT_GROUP", 
        "ports": []
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('underlying_interface_id')
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (1000001) of parameter 'rate_limit' does not meet a condition: 'must be less than or equal to 1000000'
    INVALID_CHARACTERS_IN_NAME HTTP 400 Invalid characters in name '#'
    CANNOT_RENAME_INTERFACE_WITH_VLANS HTTP 409 Interface 'i-eth1' has VLANs. Renaming the interface is not allowed
    INTERFACE_IN_USE_BY_ASSOCIATED_NET_SPACE HTTP 409 The interface is in use by network space(s) associated with a service
    OPERATION_NOT_SUPPORTED HTTP 409 updating attributes of a single port interface is not supported
    INTERFACE_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 An interface with this name already exists

    Set Kms Configuration

    Description Update KMS configuration
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/systemkms/set_configuration
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "kms_ca_certificate": "abcd"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "kms_ca_certificate": "123456", 
        "kms_servers": [
            {
                "port": 8080, 
                "address": "a.infinidat.com"
            }
        ], 
        "infinibox_kmip_certificate": "123456", 
        "kms_username": null, 
        "ignore_kms_certificate": false
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('kms_ca_certificate')
    KMS_INCONSISTENT_PORT HTTP 409 The given KMS servers must have the same port
    KMS_INVALID_SERVER_ADDRESS HTTP 409 The given address abcd.12 is not valid
    KMS_MAX_KMS_SERVER_NODES_REACHED HTTP 409 Cannot configure more than 1 KMS server nodes
    KMS_INVALID_PORT HTTP 409 The given KMS port -1 is not valid
    KMS_INCOMPLETE_CREDENTIALS HTTP 409 The given credentials are incomplete. Either the user name or password is missing
    KMS_EMPTY_CREDENTIALS HTTP 409 The username or password provided cannot be an empty string
    KMS_ILLEGAL_EMPTY_CREDENTIALS HTTP 409 Both credentials should be null or hold a value

    Description Upload CA certificate
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/systemkms/upload_kms_ca_certificate

    Roles INFINIDAT,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL

    URL Parameters none

    System States ALL

            "signature_algorithm": "SHA256WITHRSA", 
            "serial_number": "1365C", 
            "expired": false, 
            "expires_on": 2198823600000
        }
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Link

    Create a Link

    Description Creates a new link to a remote machine.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/links
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "local_replication_network_space_id": 1000, 
    "witness_address": "172.168.10.10", 
    "remote_host": "1.1.1.1", 
    "name": "auto-link--48e76131-cc40-4"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "remote_replication_network_space_id": 34, 
        "remote_link_id": 44, 
        "state_description": null, 
        "local_replication_network_space_id": 1000, 
        "last_connection_timestamp": null, 
        "link_state": "UP", 
        "local_witness_state": null, 
        "_local_host": null, 
        "id": 624, 
        "remote_system_serial_number": 5222, 
        "async_only": false, 
        "link_mode": "ACTIVE", 
        "local_link_replication_type": [
            "ACTIVE_ACTIVE", 
            "SYNC", 
            "ASYNC"
        ], 
        "_link_configuration_guid": "06196c2c-55e9-42a9-9dea-c6f8838ff825", 
        "connect_timeout": 10000, 
        "is_local_link_ready_for_sync": true, 
        "keep_alive_time": 10000, 
        "local_witness_state_description": null, 
        "remote_witness_state": null, 
        "resiliency_mode": null, 
        "witness_address": "172.168.10.10", 
        "remote_system_name": "fred", 
        "retry_wait": 500, 
        "name": "auto-link--48e76131-cc40-4", 
        "_version": 1, 
        "retry_count": 4, 
        "_remote_management_ip": null, 
        "remote_version": "6.0.14.0-dev", 
        "link_replication_type": [
            "ACTIVE_ACTIVE", 
            "SYNC", 
            "ASYNC"
        ], 
        "remote_host": "1.1.1.1", 
        "remote_replication_ip_addresses": [
            {
                "management": true, 
                "ip_address": "1.1.1.1", 
                "link_id": 624, 
                "type": "MANAGEMENT", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 625
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.2", 
                "link_id": 624, 
                "type": "ASYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 626
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.3", 
                "link_id": 624, 
                "type": "ASYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 627
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.4", 
                "link_id": 624, 
                "type": "ASYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 628
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.5", 
                "link_id": 624, 
                "type": "SYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 629
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.6", 
                "link_id": 624, 
                "type": "SYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 630
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.7", 
                "link_id": 624, 
                "type": "SYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 631
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('async_only')
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('remote_host') could not be translated to an expected type
    VERSION_MISMATCH HTTP 403 The remote system has an older InfiniBox software version
    LINK_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 An entity with this name already exists
    LINK_TO_HOST_ALREADY_EXISTS HTTP 409 A link to a remote system '1.1.1.1' already exists
    REMOTE_API_FAILURE HTTP 409 Error on '1.1.1.1': null
    CANNOT_LINK_SYSTEM_TO_ITSELF HTTP 409 Cannot create a loop-back link to the same system. '192.168.2.3' is actually the local system
    LINK_TOO_MANY_NET_SPACES HTTP 409 No network space was specified for the link, and there are more than one defined. Please choose one
    LINK_INVALID_NET_SPACE HTTP 409 The network space specified was invalid
    LINK_NET_SPACE_INSUFFICIENT_IPS HTTP 409 Invalid IP assignments are defined for local network space 'auto-ipd--bd968143-3329-43'. At least seven enabled IPs are needed for sync replication. One reserved for management interface, at least three ASYNC IPs and three SYNC IPs.
    LINK_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED HTTP 409 Cannot define a witness on a local 'async only' link type
    LINK_NO_NET_SPACES HTTP 409 No network spaces were found for the link

    Delete a Link

    Description Delete a link.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Deleting the link will prevent the system from replicating data to or from the remote system
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/links/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long The ID of the link to delete
    force_if_no_remote_credentials Boolean Allow this operation even if a login error is returned by the remote system
    force_if_remote_error Boolean Allow this operation even if an error is returned by the remote system
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "remote_replication_network_space_id": 34, 
        "remote_link_id": 44, 
        "state_description": null, 
        "local_replication_network_space_id": 1000, 
        "last_connection_timestamp": null, 
        "link_state": null, 
        "local_witness_state": null, 
        "_local_host": null, 
        "id": 2712, 
        "remote_system_serial_number": 2923, 
        "async_only": false, 
        "link_mode": "ACTIVE", 
        "local_link_replication_type": [
            "SYNC", 
            "ASYNC"
        ], 
        "_link_configuration_guid": "f8b08f09-b76e-4d92-ba7a-1c04104cffd5", 
        "connect_timeout": 10000, 
        "is_local_link_ready_for_sync": true, 
        "keep_alive_time": 10000, 
        "local_witness_state_description": null, 
        "remote_witness_state": null, 
        "resiliency_mode": null, 
        "witness_address": null, 
        "remote_system_name": "fred", 
        "retry_wait": 500, 
        "name": "auto-link--98b56ea8-9e97-4", 
        "_version": 1, 
        "retry_count": 4, 
        "_remote_management_ip": null, 
        "remote_version": "5.0.0.0", 
        "link_replication_type": [
            "SYNC", 
            "ASYNC"
        ], 
        "remote_host": "1.1.1.1", 
        "remote_replication_ip_addresses": [
            {
                "management": true, 
                "ip_address": "1.1.1.1", 
                "link_id": 2712, 
                "type": "MANAGEMENT", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 2713
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.2",

            {

                "ip_address": "2.2.2.5", 
                "link_id": 2712, 
                "type": "SYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 2717
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.6", 
                "link_id": 2712, 
                "type": "SYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 2718
            }, 
            {
                "management": false, 
                "ip_address": "2.2.2.7", 
                "link_id": 2712, 
                "type": "SYNC", 
                "local": false, 
                "id": 2719
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Deleting the link will prevent the system from replicating data to or from the remote system
    REMOTE_PERMISSION_REQUIRED HTTP 403 The operation failed as it requires permission on the remote system
    REPLICA_INVALID_LINK HTTP 409 Error on 'ibox012-mock-no-bbu': The link is detached
    LOW_PHYSICAL_SPACE HTTP 409 Error on 'fred': Not enough free space to unlock the pool
    REMOTE_API_FAILURE HTTP 409 Error on 'fred': Service Unavailable
    LINK_IO_ERROR HTTP 409 I/O error when trying to communicate with remote system '{host}'
    LINK_ERROR HTTP 409 Cannot delete link to fred because it has replicas defined with it

    Get all Links

    Description Get all of the links.
    Filterable and Sortable fields:connect_timeout,id,keep_alive_time,_link_configuration_guid,link_mode,name,remote_host,remote_link_id,_remote_management_ip,remote_system_name,remote_system_serial_number,remote_replication_network_space_id,remote_version,retry_count,retry_wait,witness_address.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/links
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  POOL_ADMIN,  READ_ONLY,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 0, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Update Link

    Description Update a link. For example, detach the link from a network space.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/links/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long The ID of the link to update
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "local_replication_network_space_id": null
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true

    Errors
    INVALID_IP_ADDRESS HTTP 400 IP address '192.168.0191' is invalid.
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('async_only')
    LINK_NET_SPACE_INSUFFICIENT_IPS HTTP 409 Invalid IP assignments are defined for local network space 'rmrEmpty'. At least seven enabled IPs are needed for sync replication. One reserved for management interface, at least three ASYNC IPs and three SYNC IPs.
    LINK_INVALID_NET_SPACE HTTP 409 The network space specified was invalid

    Live Counters Metrics

    This resource sets and reports on InfiniBox performance counters. A performance counter is a combination of filters and collectors.

    • A filter is a pair of the metered entity and metered value.
      • Metered entity - for example, pool, filesystem
      • Value - the collected metrics (for example: read, write, io_size)
    • A collector is a set of filter, type and collected metrics
      • Type - the way the collected metrics is returned (either of the following: COUNTER, TOP, HISTOGRAM, AGGREGATOR)
      • Collected metrics - for example: throughput, IOPs, latency

    In order to create a counter:

    1. Create a filter
    2. Add an operation type to the filter
    3. Add an entity to the filter
    4. Create a collector
    5. Collect the performance counter 

    Add an Operation Type to a Filter

    Description Add an operation type to a filter.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/metrics/filters/{filter_id}
    URL Parameters
    filter_id long filter handle id
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "blah": "halb"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "id": 30002
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NOT_SUPPORTED_MULTIPLE_FIELDS_IN_FILTER HTTP 400 Filter cannot be updated with multiple fields in one request
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (null) of parameter 'file' does not meet a condition: 'must be valid value of file'
    LC_INVALID_FIELD_VALUE HTTP 409 The value 'value' is invalid for field 'name' and filter ID 30030
    LC_INVALID_FIELD_NAME HTTP 409 The field 'blah' is invalid for filter ID 30001

    Collect the Monitored Entity Performance

    Description Return results by monitor. Results for several monitors can be returned together.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/metrics/collectors/data
    URL Parameters
    collector_id String The ID of the collector
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "collectors": [
            {
                "fields": [
                    "throughput", 
                    "iops"
                ], 
                "id": 12, 
                "collector_type": "COUNTER", 
                "interval_milliseconds": 1000, 
                "data": [
                    [
                        100, 
                        200
                    ], 
                    [
                        200, 
                        300
                    ]
                ], 
                "end_timestamp_milliseconds": 234875628437562
            }, 
            {
                "grouping_field": "user_id", 
                "fields": [
                    "user_id", 
                    "throughput", 
                    "ops", 
                    "latency"
                ], 
                "id": 216172782113784740, 
                "sorting_field": "throughput", 
                "collector_type": "TOP", 
                "interval_milliseconds": 1000, 
                "data": [
                    [
                        [
                            "0", 
                            1017995776, 
                            25982, 
                            266
                        ]
                    ], 
                    [

                            25350,

                            "0",

                        ]
                    ],

                        [
                            "0", 
                            1008824832, 
                            24937, 
                            269
                        ]
                    ]
                ], 
                "end_timestamp_milliseconds": 1453630430299
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    MISSING_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request is empty

    Create New Filter

    Description Create a new filter and state the protocol (service).
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/metrics/filters
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "protocol": "NFSv3"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "id": 30001
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NOT_SUPPORTED_MULTIPLE_FIELDS_IN_FILTER HTTP 400 Filter cannot be created with multiple fields in one request
    MISSING_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request is empty
    AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED HTTP 401 The operation requires authentication
    FM_DETERMINATION_FAILED HTTP 409 Failed to determine the correct FM

    Creating a Collector

    Description Creating a collector.
    Available collector types are: COUNTER, TOP, HISTOGRAM, AGGREGATOR.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/metrics/collectors
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "collected_fields": null, 
    "type": "COUNTER", 
    "filters": {
        "protocol_type": "SAN", 
        "io_size": ">4K"
    }
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "collected_fields": [
            "throughput"
        ], 
        "type": "COUNTER", 
        "id": 30003, 
        "filter_id": 30002
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (null) of parameter 'collected_fields' does not meet a condition: 'may not be null'
    MALFORMED_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request content is malformed
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('sort_ascending') could not be translated to an expected type
    FM_DETERMINATION_FAILED HTTP 409 Failed to determine the correct FM

    Deleting a Collector

    Description Deleting a collector.
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/metrics/collectors/{collector_id}
    URL Parameters
    collector_id long The ID of the collector
    JSON Data none
    Returns
    Errors See general list of error codes.
    No request examples available

    Description Delete a filter.
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/metrics/filters/{filter_id}
    URL Parameters
    filter_id long filter id
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "id": 30019
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Get Available Fields

    Description Get available filter fields for starting new filter
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/metrics/available_fields
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "available_filter_fields": [
            {
                "values": [
                    "NFS", 
                    "RMR", 
                    "SAN"
                ], 
                "type": "enum", 
                "name": "protocol_type"
            }, 
            {
                "values": [
                    "NFSv3", 
                    "FC", 
                    "iSCSI"
                ], 
                "type": "enum", 
                "name": "protocol"
            }, 
            {
                "values": [
                    "read", 
                    "write"
                ], 
                "type": "enum", 
                "name": "operation_type"
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Get Next Available Fields

    Description Get next available fields for specific filter
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/metrics/filters/{filter_id}/available_fields
    URL Parameters
    filter_id long filter handle id
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "available_filter_fields": [
            {
                "type": "uint", 
                "name": "user_id"
            }, 
            {
                "values": [
                    "1K", 
                    "4K", 
                    ">4K"
                ], 
                "type": "histogram", 
                "name": "io_size"
            }, 
            {
                "type": "uint", 
                "name": "latency"
            }, 
            {
                "type": "string", 
                "name": "file"
            }
        ], 
        "id": 30006, 
        "available_collector_fields": [
            {
                "name": "throughput", 
                "unit": "bytes", 
                "description": "counter the throughput"
            }, 
            {
                "name": "iops", 
                "unit": "kb", 
                "description": "counter the io per seconds"
            }, 
            {
                "name": "latency", 
                "unit": "int", 
                "description": "counter the latency"
            }
        ]
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    MALFORMED_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request content is malformed
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (BLA) of parameter 'level' does not meet a condition: 'can be BASIC or ADVANCED'

    Description Returns the message that is displayed on the GUI welcome screen.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/motd
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL

    Invalid Operation States
    System StatesMethods
    LOCAL LOCAL_SHUTDOWN ALL

    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": "", 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Metadata

    Add Metadata to a Storage Entity

    Description Add or update metadata for an object.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/metadata/{object_id}
    URL Parameters
    object_id long ID of the object
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "key1": "value1"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": [
        {
            "key": "myKey", 
            "value": "value2", 
            "object_type": "pool", 
            "id": 4846, 
            "object_id": 1000
        }
    ], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    MALFORMED_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request content is malformed
    USER_IS_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 User 'auto-POOL_ADMIN-0bd7b7c7-3' is forbidden to modify cg 'auto-cg_-a459ae6d-0ae3-42b'
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: insufficient privileges
    METADATA_IS_NOT_SUPPORTED_FOR_ENTITY HTTP 404 This entity ID -1111 does not exist nor support metadata
    METADATA_PER_REQUEST_EXCEEDED HTTP 409 Too many metadata per request
    METADATA_SIZE_EXCEEDED HTTP 409 Metadata value is too big
    METADATA_IN_SYSTEM_EXCEEDED HTTP 409 Total size of metadata is exceeded
    METADATA_PER_ENTITY_EXCEEDED HTTP 409 Too many metadata per entity

    Add Metadata to the System

    Description Add or update metadata for the system.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/metadata/system
    URL Parameters none
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "key1": "value1"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": [
        {
            "key": "key1", 
            "value": "value1", 
            "object_type": "system", 
            "id": 4715, 
            "object_id": -4
        }
    ], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Delete Metadata by Object

    Description Delete all of the object’s metadata.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    This operation will remove all of the metadata for the specified object
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/metadata/{object_id}
    URL Parameters
    object_id long ID of the object
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": [
        {
            "key": "myKey", 
            "value": "value1", 
            "object_type": "pool", 
            "id": 4760, 
            "object_id": 1000
        }
    ], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 This operation will remove all of the metadata for the specified object
    METADATA_IS_NOT_SUPPORTED_FOR_ENTITY HTTP 404 This entity ID -1111 does not exist nor support metadata

    Delete Metadata by Object and Key

    Description Delete a specific key from the object’s metadata.
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/metadata/{object_id}/{key}
    URL Parameters
    object_id long ID of the object
    key String The key
    Roles POOL_ADMIN,  ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "key": "myKey", 
        "value": "value1", 
        "object_type": "pool", 
        "id": 4527, 
        "object_id": 1000
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    METADATA_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Metadata not found

    Get all of the Metadata

    Description Get all of the metadata for all of the objects.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/metadata/
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 3, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [
        {
            "key": "key1", 
            "value": "value1", 
            "object_type": "system", 
            "id": 4715, 
            "object_id": -4
        }, 
        {
            "key": "key2", 
            "value": "value2", 
            "object_type": "system", 
            "id": 4716, 
            "object_id": -4
        }, 
        {
            "key": "key0", 
            "value": "value0", 
            "object_type": "pool", 
            "id": 4714, 
            "object_id": 1000
        }
    ], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NOT_FILTERABLE_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains a field that cannot be filtered: ('object_type')
