    Nlm Lock

    Break Nlm Locks

    Description Break NLM Locks
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Manually breaking a lock may disrupt the application relying on that lock, and may lead to the application suffering data corruption
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/nlm_locks/break
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "locks_broken": 1234
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    INVALID_IP_ADDRESS HTTP 400 IP address '1.2.3' is invalid.
    NLM_LOCK_PATH_INVALID HTTP 400 Invalid lock file path
    NLM_INVALID_LOCK_ID HTTP 400 Invalid Lock ID
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: insufficient privileges
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Manually breaking a lock may disrupt the application relying on that lock, and may lead to the application suffering data corruption
    NLM_LOCK_DOES_NOT_EXIST HTTP 404 NLM Lock 1234 does not exist
    FILESYSTEM_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Filesystem not found
    NLM_LOCK_QUERY_FILE_PATH_WITHOUT_FILESYSTEM HTTP 409 Using the file_path option requires specifying the filesystem name as well
    NLM_LOCK_PATH_UNAVAILABLE HTTP 409 The lock file path is unavailable
    LOCK_ALREADY_IDENTIFIED HTTP 409 Whenever the Lock ID is specified there is no need to specify other attributes

    Get all Nlm Locks

    Description Return all NLM Locks
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/nlm_locks
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 10, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffffe", 
            "granted_at": 986546581, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "WAITING", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some1.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "shared", 
            "owner": "124@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1009, 
            "file_path": "/file1"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffffd", 
            "granted_at": 986546582, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "GRANTED", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some2.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "shared", 
            "owner": "125@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1010, 
            "file_path": "/file2"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffffc", 
            "granted_at": 986546583, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "WAITING", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some3.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "exclusive", 
            "owner": "126@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1001, 
            "file_path": "/file3"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffffb", 
            "granted_at": 986546584, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "GRANTED", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some4.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "shared", 
            "owner": "127@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1002, 
            "file_path": "/file4"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffffa", 
            "granted_at": 986546585, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "WAITING", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some5.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "shared", 
            "owner": "128@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1003, 
            "file_path": "/file5"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffff9", 
            "granted_at": 986546586, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "GRANTED", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some6.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "exclusive", 
            "owner": "129@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1004, 
            "file_path": "/file6"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffff8", 
            "granted_at": 986546587, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "WAITING", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some7.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "shared", 
            "owner": "130@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1005, 
            "file_path": "/file7"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffff7", 
            "granted_at": 986546588, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "GRANTED", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some8.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "shared", 
            "owner": "131@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1006, 
            "file_path": "/file8"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffff6", 
            "granted_at": 986546589, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "WAITING", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some9.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "exclusive", 
            "owner": "132@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1007, 
            "file_path": "/file9"
        }, 
        {
            "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffff5", 
            "granted_at": 986546590, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "offset": 0, 
            "state": "GRANTED", 
            "length": 1024, 
            "client": "some10.local.com", 
            "lock_type": "shared", 
            "owner": "133@hostname", 
            "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
            "filesystem_id": 1008, 
            "file_path": "/file10"
        }
    ], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NOT_FILTERABLE_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains a field that cannot be filtered: ('granted_at')
    NLM_LOCK_PATH_INVALID HTTP 400 Invalid lock file path
    NLM_INVALID_LOCK_ID HTTP 400 Invalid Lock ID
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('aaaaa')
    INVALID_IP_ADDRESS HTTP 400 IP address '1.2.3' is invalid.
    UNSUPPORTED_FILTER_RELATION HTTP 400 The filtering operator 'IN' is not supported by this resource
    FILESYSTEM_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Filesystem not found
    NLM_LOCK_QUERY_FILE_PATH_WITHOUT_FILESYSTEM HTTP 409 Using the file_path option requires specifying the filesystem name as well
    LOCK_ALREADY_IDENTIFIED HTTP 409 Whenever the Lock ID is specified there is no need to specify other attributes
    NLM_LOCK_PATH_UNAVAILABLE HTTP 409 The lock file path is unavailable

    Get Nlm Lock by Lock ID

    Description Return NLM Lock by lock id
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/nlm_locks/{lockId}
    URL Parameters
    lockId String NLM Lock ID
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "lock_id": "7ffffffffffffffe", 
        "granted_at": 986546581, 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "offset": 0, 
        "state": "WAITING", 
        "length": 1024, 
        "client": "some1.local.com", 
        "lock_type": "shared", 
        "owner": "124@hostname", 
        "file_path_status": "AVAILABLE", 
        "filesystem_id": 1001, 
        "file_path": "/file1"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NLM_LOCK_DOES_NOT_EXIST HTTP 404 NLM Lock 1e1e1e does not exist

    Remove Orphan Nlm Locks

    Description Remove orphan NLM Locks
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Manually removing locks may disrupt the application relying on that lock, and may lead to the application suffering data corruption
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/nlm_locks/remove_orphan
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "locks_removed": 1234
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: insufficient privileges
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Manually removing locks may disrupt the application relying on that lock, and may lead to the application suffering data corruption

    Network Space

    Add IP Address to Network Space

    Description Add IP address to a network space.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/network/spaces/{id}/ips
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the network space
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    "\"192.168.11.3\""
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "properties": {}, 
        "name": "ipd1", 
        "service": "NAS_SERVICE", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "interfaces": [
            47
        ], 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "ips": [
            {
                "reserved": false, 
                "type": "NAS", 
                "enabled": true, 
                "interface_id": null, 
                "tpgt": null, 
                "ip_address": "192.168.11.3", 
                "vlan_id": 1
            }
        ], 
        "automatic_ip_failback": false, 
        "vmac_addresses": [
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fb"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fa"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fd"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fc"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:ff"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fe"
            }
        ], 
        "routes": [
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
                "id": 48, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
            }, 
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "2.2.3.32", 
                "id": 49, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.2"
            }
        ], 
        "mtu": 1500, 
        "network_config": {
            "netmask": 24, 
            "network": "192.168.11.0", 
            "default_gateway": "192.168.11.254"
        }
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    INVALID_IP_ADDRESS HTTP 400 IP address '192.168.10.0' is invalid. IP address can not match a network, broadcast or default gateway addresses
    NET_SPACE_ADDRESS_CONFLICT HTTP 409 IP address cannot be added as it already exists
    IP_ADDRESS_ROUTE_GATEWAY_CONFLICT HTTP 409 IP address and route gateway are in conflict
    IP_ADDRESS_GATEWAY_CONFLICT HTTP 409 IP address and default gateway are in conflict
    NET_SPACE_INCOMPATIBLE_NET_MASK HTTP 409 IP address '192.168.10.1' must be compatible with network mask '192.168.11.0/24' to be added
    IP_ADDRESS_ISNS_SERVER_CONFLICT HTTP 409 IP address '192.168.11.2' conflicts with the address of one of the iSNS servers configured on this network space
    NETWORK_SPACE_IP_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 IP address cannot be added. Network space IP count limit reached
    IP_ADDRESS_CONFLICT HTTP 409 IP address cannot be added. Already exists on the network

    Add Route to Network Space

    Description Add a route to a network space.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/network/spaces/{network_space_id}/routes/
    URL Parameters
    network_space_id long ID of the network space
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "netmask": 27, 
    "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
    "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "netmask": 27, 
        "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
        "id": 6142, 
        "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    MISSING_FIELD HTTP 400 A field ('routes.netmask') is missing in an object passed
    ROUTE_SPECIFIED_MULTIPLE_TIMES HTTP 400 A route can be used only once in a routing table
    NETWORK_SPACE_SERVICE_ROUTE_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Network space service route count limit reached (2)
    NET_SPACE_INCOMPATIBLE_SUBNET_AND_NET_MASK HTTP 409 The network address provided '1.2.3.32' does not match the network mask '26'
    NETWORK_SPACE_ROUTE_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Network space route count limit reached (1)
    IP_ADDRESS_ROUTE_GATEWAY_CONFLICT HTTP 409 IP address and route gateway are in conflict

    Create a Network Space

    Description Create a network space.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/network/spaces
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "name": "ipd1", 
    "automatic_ip_failback": false, 
    "interfaces": [
        47
    ], 
    "rate_limit": null, 
    "properties": {}, 
    "service": "NAS_SERVICE", 
    "routes": [
        {
            "netmask": 27, 
            "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
            "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
        }, 
        {
            "netmask": 27, 
            "destination": "2.2.3.32", 
            "gateway": "192.168.11.2"
        }
    ], 
    "mtu": 1500, 
    "network_config": {
        "netmask": 24, 
        "network": "192.168.11.0", 
        "default_gateway": "192.168.11.254"
    }
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "properties": {}, 
        "name": "ipd1", 
        "service": "NAS_SERVICE", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "interfaces": [
            47
        ], 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "ips": [], 
        "automatic_ip_failback": false, 
        "vmac_addresses": [
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fb"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fa"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fd"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fc"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:ff"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fe"
            }
        ], 
        "routes": [
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
                "id": 48, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
            }, 
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "2.2.3.32", 
                "id": 49, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.2"
            }
        ], 
        "mtu": 1500, 
        "network_config": {
            "netmask": 24, 
            "network": "192.168.11.0", 
            "default_gateway": "192.168.11.254"
        }
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    ROUTE_SPECIFIED_MULTIPLE_TIMES HTTP 400 A route can be used only once in a routing table
    MISSING_FIELD HTTP 400 A field ('service') is missing in an object passed
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('properties') could not be translated to an expected type
    NET_SPACE_SERVICE_PROPERTIES HTTP 400 The properties provided do not match the network space service
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (null) of parameter 'service' does not meet a condition: 'may not be null'
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: Method is not allowed for READ_ONLY
    METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 405 The resource at this path does not support this method
    NETWORK_SPACE_INCONSISTENT_VLAN_NAME HTTP 409 A network space using VLANs requires all interfaces to have the same name on all nodes
    SYSTEM_CANNOT_SUPPORT_ISCSI_AA HTTP 409 Active-Active Replication and ISCSI network space cannot exist on same system. Please contact INFINIDAT support for further information
    ISCSI_DISABLED HTTP 409 iSCSI is disabled, please contact INFINIDAT support to enable it
    NET_SPACE_MUST_DEFINE_ONE_INTERFACE_PER_NODE HTTP 409 Network space must define one interface per node
    NO_SUCH_OBJECT HTTP 409 No such object: interface - 111
    NETWORK_SPACE_INCONSISTENT_INTERFACE_TYPE HTTP 409 All interfaces in the network space must be of the same type
    OPERATION_NOT_SUPPORTED HTTP 409 Setting a rate limit on a network space, which includes an interface of type port is not supported
    NET_SPACE_CANT_USE_EMPTY_PORTGROUP HTTP 409 Port group without ports ('emptyIntf') cannot be part of a network space
    NET_SPACE_INCOMPATIBLE_SUBNET_AND_GATEWAY HTTP 409 The gateway '192.168.12.0' is not in subnet '192.168.11.0/24'
    NET_SPACE_INCOMPATIBLE_SUBNET_AND_NET_MASK HTTP 409 The network address provided '172.16.16.16' does not match the network mask '24'
    NETWORK_SPACE_SERVICE_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 The system reached the maximum number of network spaces with service 'RMR' (10)
    NET_SPACE_GATEWAY_CONFLICT HTTP 409 Gateway '192.168.11.0' is illegal - conflicts with the Network address
    NETWORK_SPACE_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 The system reached the maximum number of network spaces (10)
    NETWORK_SPACE_ROUTE_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Network space route count limit reached (1)
    NET_SPACE_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 An entity with this name already exists
    MTU_TOO_HIGH HTTP 409 MTU for this network space is limited by the MTU of network space 'ns1'
    NET_SPACE_INTERFACE_CONFLICT HTTP 409 Two network spaces cannot contain the same interface for the same service
    NET_SPACE_DESTINATION_AND_NETWORK_OVERLAP HTTP 409 The route's destination '192.168.11.0/19' and the network '192.168.11.0/24' overlap
    MTU_TOO_LOW HTTP 409 MTU for this network space must be higher / equal to the MTU of network space 'ns2' as they share the same physical interface
    NETWORK_SPACE_SERVICE_ROUTE_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Network space service route count limit reached (1)
    NETWORK_SPACE_INCONSISTENT_VLAN_IDS HTTP 409 All VLAN interfaces in the network space must be consistent

    Delete a Network Space

    Description Delete a network space.
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/network/spaces/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the network space
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "properties": {}, 
        "name": "ipd", 
        "service": "NAS_SERVICE", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "interfaces": [
            1626
        ], 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "ips": [], 
        "automatic_ip_failback": false, 
        "vmac_addresses": [
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fe"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:ff"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fa"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fb"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fc"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fd"
            }
        ], 
        "routes": [], 
        "mtu": 1500, 
        "network_config": {
            "netmask": 24, 
            "network": "192.168.11.0", 
            "default_gateway": "192.168.11.254"
        }
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NET_SPACE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Invalid network space ID
    NET_SPACE_NOT_EMPTY HTTP 409 The network space has to be empty of IP addresses in order to be removed

    Delete Network Space Route by ID

    Description Delete network space's route by id.
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/network/spaces/{network_space_id}/routes/{id}
    URL Parameters
    network_space_id long ID of the network space
    id long ID of the route
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "netmask": 27, 
        "destination": "3.2.3.32", 
        "id": 6142, 
        "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    ROUTE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Invalid route ID
    NET_SPACE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Invalid network space ID

    Disable IP Address for a Network Space

    Description Disable IP address for a network space.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Disabling the last network space IP address will make the network space inaccessible, and will degrade the functionality of the service service_name
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/network/spaces/{id}/ips/{ip}/disable
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the network space
    ip String IP address
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "properties": {}, 
        "name": "ipd1", 
        "service": "NAS_SERVICE", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "interfaces": [
            47
        ], 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "ips": [
            {
                "reserved": false, 
                "type": "NAS", 
                "enabled": true, 
                "interface_id": null, 
                "tpgt": null, 
                "ip_address": "192.168.11.3", 
                "vlan_id": 1
            }, 
            {
                "reserved": false, 
                "type": "NAS", 
                "enabled": false, 
                "interface_id": null, 
                "tpgt": null, 
                "ip_address": "192.168.11.4", 
                "vlan_id": 1
            }
        ], 
        "automatic_ip_failback": false, 
        "vmac_addresses": [
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fb"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fa"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fd"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fc"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:ff"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fe"
            }
        ], 
        "routes": [
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
                "id": 48, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
            }, 
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "2.2.3.32", 
                "id": 49, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.2"
            }
        ], 
        "mtu": 1500, 
        "network_config": {
            "netmask": 24, 
            "network": "192.168.11.0", 
            "default_gateway": "192.168.11.254"
        }
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Disabling the last network space IP address will make the network space inaccessible, and will degrade the functionality of the service (NAS_SERVICE)
    NET_SPACE_IN_USE HTTP 403 The network space is in use by another entity of type link
    NET_SPACE_IP_IN_USE_BY_MANAGEMENT HTTP 409 The IP address cannot be disabled because it is in use by the management interface
    IP_ADDRESS_ALREADY_DISABLED HTTP 409 IP address is already disabled

    Enable IP Address for a Network Space

    Description Enable IP address for a network space.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/network/spaces/{id}/ips/{ip}/enable
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the network space
    ip String IP address
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "properties": {}, 
        "name": "ipd1", 
        "service": "NAS_SERVICE", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "interfaces": [
            5579
        ], 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "ips": [
            {
                "reserved": false, 
                "type": "NAS", 
                "enabled": true, 
                "interface_id": null, 
                "tpgt": null, 
                "ip_address": "192.168.11.1", 
                "vlan_id": 1
            }
        ], 
        "automatic_ip_failback": false, 
        "vmac_addresses": [
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fd"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fe"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:ff"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fa"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fb"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fc"
            }
        ], 
        "routes": [], 
        "mtu": 1500, 
        "network_config": {
            "netmask": 24, 
            "network": "192.168.11.0", 
            "default_gateway": "192.168.11.254"
        }
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    IP_ADDRESS_ALREADY_ENABLED HTTP 409 IP address is already enabled

    Get a Network Space

    Description Get a network space.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/network/spaces/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the network space
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN,  POOL_ADMIN,  READ_ONLY
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "properties": {}, 
        "name": "ipd1", 
        "service": "NAS_SERVICE", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "interfaces": [
            47
        ], 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "ips": [
            {
                "reserved": false, 
                "type": "NAS", 
                "enabled": true, 
                "interface_id": null, 
                "tpgt": null, 
                "ip_address": "192.168.11.3", 
                "vlan_id": 1
            }, 
            {
                "reserved": false, 
                "type": "NAS", 
                "enabled": true, 
                "interface_id": null, 
                "tpgt": null, 
                "ip_address": "192.168.11.4", 
                "vlan_id": 1
            }
        ], 
        "automatic_ip_failback": false, 
        "vmac_addresses": [
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fb"

            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fa"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fd"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fc"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:ff"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fe"
            }
        ], 
        "routes": [
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
                "id": 48, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
            }, 
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "2.2.3.32", 
                "id": 49, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.2"

        ], 
        "mtu": 1500, 
        "network_config": {
            "netmask": 24, 
            "network": "192.168.11.0", 
            "default_gateway": "192.168.11.254"

    }, 
    "error": null
}

    Get all Network Space Routes

    Description Get all routes of a network space.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/network/spaces/{network_space_id}/routes
    URL Parameters
    network_space_id long ID of the network space
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN,  POOL_ADMIN,  READ_ONLY
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 2, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [
        {
            "netmask": 27, 
            "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
            "id": 5901, 
            "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
        }, 
        {
            "netmask": 27, 
            "destination": "2.2.3.32", 
            "id": 5902, 
            "gateway": "192.168.11.2"
        }
    ], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Get all Network Spaces

    Description Get all network spaces.
    Filterable and Sortable fields:automatic_ip_failback,id,mtu,name,network_config,rate_limit,service.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/network/spaces
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN,  POOL_ADMIN,  READ_ONLY
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 0, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Get Network Space Route by ID

    Description Get network space's route by id.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/network/spaces/{network_space_id}/routes/{id}
    URL Parameters
    network_space_id long ID of the network space
    id long ID of the route
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN,  POOL_ADMIN,  READ_ONLY
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "netmask": 27, 
        "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
        "id": 7106, 
        "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    ROUTE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Invalid route ID
    NET_SPACE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Invalid network space ID

    Remove IP Address from Network Space

    Description Remove an IP address from a network space.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Deleting the last network space IP address will make the network space inaccessible, and will degrade the functionality of the service service_name
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/network/spaces/{id}/ips/{ip}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the network space
    ip String IP address
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "properties": {
            "is_async_only": false
        }, 
        "name": "auto-ipd--ef59cdcc-2dee-48", 
        "service": "RMR_SERVICE", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "interfaces": [
            2710
        ], 
        "rate_limit": null, 
        "id": 1000,

            {

            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:ff"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fa"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:f3"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fb"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA",

        ], 
        "routes": [], 
        "mtu": 1500, 
        "network_config": {
            "netmask": 24, 
            "network": "192.168.2.0", 
            "default_gateway": "192.168.2.1"
        }
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NET_SPACE_IP_NOT_EXISTS HTTP 400 IP does not exists in network space
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Deleting the last network space IP address will make the network space inaccessible, and will degrade the functionality of the service (NAS_SERVICE)
    NET_SPACE_IP_IN_USE_BY_MANAGEMENT HTTP 409 The IP address cannot be deleted because it is in use by the management interface
    NET_SPACE_IP_ENABLED HTTP 409 IP address is enabled

    Update a Network Space

    Description Modify the network space IP address, network mask, default gateway or service's properties.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/network/spaces/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the network space
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "rate_limit": 1000
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "properties": {}, 
        "name": "ipd1", 
        "service": "NAS_SERVICE", 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "interfaces": [
            47
        ], 
        "rate_limit": 1000, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "ips": [
            {
                "reserved": false, 
                "type": "NAS", 
                "enabled": true, 
                "interface_id": null, 
                "tpgt": null, 
                "ip_address": "192.168.11.3", 
                "vlan_id": 1
            }, 
            {
                "reserved": false, 
                "type": "NAS", 
                "enabled": false, 
                "interface_id": null, 
                "tpgt": null, 
                "ip_address": "192.168.11.4", 
                "vlan_id": 1
            }
        ], 
        "automatic_ip_failback": false, 
        "vmac_addresses": [
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fb"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fa"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fd"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fc"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:ff"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "DATA", 
                "vmac_address": "74:2b:0f:ff:ff:fe"
            }
        ], 
        "routes": [
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "1.2.3.32", 
                "id": 48, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.1"
            }, 
            {
                "netmask": 27, 
                "destination": "2.2.3.32", 
                "id": 49, 
                "gateway": "192.168.11.2"
            }
        ], 
        "mtu": 1500, 
        "network_config": {
            "netmask": 24, 
            "network": "192.168.11.0", 
            "default_gateway": "192.168.11.254"
        }
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('service')
    UNSUPPORTED_VALUE HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported value (null) for field ('iscsi_isns_servers')
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('iscsi_tcp_port') could not be translated to an expected type
    INVALID_IP_ADDRESS HTTP 400 IP address 'someInValidIp' is invalid.
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (-1) of parameter 'mtu' does not meet a condition: 'must be greater than or equal to 1280'
    NET_SPACE_SERVICE_PROPERTIES HTTP 400 The properties provided do not match the network space service
    NET_SPACE_IN_USE HTTP 403 The network space is in use by another entity of type link
    METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 405 The resource at this path does not support this method
    NET_SPACE_INTERFACE_CONFLICT HTTP 409 At least one of the interfaces that are provided for the network space has to be in Enabled state
    OPERATION_NOT_SUPPORTED HTTP 409 Setting a rate limit on a network space, which includes an interface of type port is not supported
    ISNS_SERVER_IP_CONFLICT HTTP 409 iSNS server '192.168.11.2' cannot be added since its address is defined as a network space IP
    NETWORK_CONFIG_MODIFY_NOT_ALLOWED_WITH_ROUTES HTTP 409 Modifying the network address or netmask of a network space with routes is not allowed
    ISNS_SERVER_UNREACHABLE HTTP 409 iSNS server '172.168.90.12' cannot be added since it is unreachable (not in the network space's netmask / routing table)
    NET_SPACE_INCOMPATIBLE_NETWORK_AND_EXISTING_IPS HTTP 409 The network is incompatible with IP addresses already defined in the network space
    ISNS_SERVERS_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 The network space reached the maximum number of isns servers (4)
    ISNS_SERVER_GATEWAY_REQUIRED HTTP 409 The default gateway cannot be removed as long as there is an iSNS server '172.168.90.12' outside the network space
    MTU_TOO_LOW HTTP 409 MTU for this network space must be higher / equal to the MTU of network space 'ns2' as they share the same physical interface
    ISNS_SERVERS_UNREACHABLE HTTP 409 iSNS servers '[172.168.90.12]' cannot be added since they are unreachable
    LINK_NET_SPACE_INSUFFICIENT_IPS HTTP 409 Invalid IP assignments are defined for local network space 'rmr-ip'. At least seven enabled IPs are needed for sync replication. One reserved for management interface, at least three ASYNC IPs and three SYNC IPs.
    MTU_TOO_HIGH HTTP 409 MTU for this network space is limited by the MTU of network space 'ns1'
    IP_ADDRESS_GATEWAY_CONFLICT HTTP 409 IP address and default gateway are in conflict

    Update Network Space Route by ID

    Description Modify a network space's route by id.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/network/spaces/{network_space_id}/routes/{id}
    URL Parameters
    network_space_id long ID of the network space
    id long ID of the route
    Roles INFINIDAT,  ADMIN,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "destination": "3.2.3.32", 
    "gateway": "192.168.11.3"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "netmask": 27, 
        "destination": "3.2.3.32", 
        "id": 5642, 
        "gateway": "192.168.11.3"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    ROUTE_SPECIFIED_MULTIPLE_TIMES HTTP 400 A route can be used only once in a routing table
    NET_SPACE_GATEWAY_CONFLICT HTTP 409 Gateway '192.168.11.255' is illegal - conflicts with the Network broadcast address
    NET_SPACE_INCOMPATIBLE_SUBNET_AND_NET_MASK HTTP 409 The network address provided '1.2.3.32' does not match the network mask '26'
    IP_ADDRESS_ROUTE_GATEWAY_CONFLICT HTTP 409 IP address and route gateway are in conflict

    JSON Data none
    Returns

    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "state_description": "", 
        "drive_index": 1, 
        "vendor": "TOSHIBA", 
        "last_probe_timestamp": 1390253860000, 
        "firmware": "N/A", 
        "probe_ttl": 1600000, 
        "node_index": 1, 
        "wearout": "n/a", 
        "state": "OK",

        "model": "AL13SEB900",

        "id": 1

    Get Rack Node by ID

    Description Return node by id
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/components/racks/{rackId}/nodes/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id String ID of the node
    Roles INFINIDAT,  TECHNICIAN,  POOL_ADMIN,  READ_ONLY,  ADMIN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "state_description": "", 
        "bios.state": "OK", 
        "protecting_bbu": 1, 
        "pgs": [], 
        "id": 1, 
        "firmware": "", 
        "probe_ttl": 60000, 
        "state": "PHASING_IN", 
        "ntp.state_description": "", 
        "connectivity_status": {
            "eth_switches": [
                "UP"
            ], 
            "pdu": [
                "UP", 
                "UP", 
                "UNKNOWN", 
                "UNKNOWN"
            ], 
            "bbu": [
                {
                    "state_description": "", 
                    "state": "OK"
                }, 
                {
                    "state_description": "",

    Phase In Node

    Description Phase in node by id
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/components/racks/{rackId}/nodes/{id}/phase_in
    URL Parameters
    id String The node id
    Roles INFINIDAT,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ACTIVE
    JSON Data none
    Returns
    Errors
    NODE_ACTIVATION_FAILED HTTP 409 Node 1 activation failed
    NODE_SECURITY_MODE_MISMATCH HTTP 409 Node 1 could not be activated due to a security mode mismatch. Reason: General error occurred
    TPM_MISSING_FOR_ACTIVATION HTTP 409 TPM module is missing from node 1, this node can't be activated while the system is in FIPS mode.
    ILLEGAL_NODE_STATE HTTP 409 Operation PHASE_IN cannot be executed on node-1 when in state PHASING_IN

    Phase Out Node

    Description Phase out node by id
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Deactivating node 'nodeName' may lead to a degradation in system performance and resiliency
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/components/racks/{rackId}/nodes/{id}/phase_out
    URL Parameters
    id String ID of the node
    approved boolean
    Roles INFINIDAT,  TECHNICIAN
    System States ACTIVE
    JSON Data none
    Returns
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Deactivating node 'node-1' may lead to a degradation in system performance and resiliency
    ILLEGAL_NODE_STATE HTTP 409 Operation PHASE_OUT cannot be executed on node-1 when in state PHASING_IN

    Notification

    Get Protocols

    Description Get a list of all supported protocols
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/notifications/protocols
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 3, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [
        "SNMP", 
        "SMTP", 
        "SYSLOG"
    ], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    JSON Data none
    Returns
    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Notification Rule

    Create Notification Rule

    Description Create a new notification rule.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/notifications/rules
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "exclude_events": [
        "CLUSTER_MAPPED", 
        "CLUSTER_RENAMED"
    ], 
    "event_level": [
        "CRITICAL", 
        "ERROR"
    ], 
    "name": "auto-filter_sort_-e29f2e62", 
    "target_id": 931, 
    "include_events": [
        "VOLUME_RESIZED", 
        "VOLUME_RESTORED"
    ], 
    "event_visibility": []
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "exclude_events": [
            "CLUSTER_MAPPED", 
            "CLUSTER_RENAMED"
        ], 
        "event_code": null, 
        "event_level": [
            "ERROR", 
            "CRITICAL"
        ], 
        "name": "auto-filter_sort_-e29f2e62", 
        "target_parameters": {}, 
        "target_id": 931, 
        "include_events": [
            "VOLUME_RESTORED", 
            "VOLUME_RESIZED"
        ], 
        "event_visibility": [], 
        "id": 932
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNSUPPORTED_VALUE HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported value ({recipients=[bar@infinidat.com]}) for field ('target_parameters')
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value ([bar]) of parameter 'foo' does not meet a condition: 'recipients'
    EMAIL_INVALID_RECIPIENT HTTP 400 Invalid email address: 'invalid_mail'
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('recipients') could not be translated to an expected type
    MISSING_FIELD HTTP 400 A field ('target_id') is missing in an object passed
    NOTIFICATION_RULE_VISIBILITY_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 The notification target is visible by all users
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Notification target not found
    INCLUDE_EXCLUDE_EVENTS_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 The notification rule cannot be created as the maximum number of included and/or excluded event was exceeded
    ILLEGAL_NOTIFICATION_RULE_DATA HTTP 409 Illegal notification rule data: At least one of the following fields must not be empty: 'event_code', 'event_level', 'include_events'
    NOTIFICATION_RULE_TARGET_NOT_APPLICABLE HTTP 409 Notification rule cannot be applied to an Infinidat target
    NOTIFICATION_RULE_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 A notification rule with this name already exists
    EMAIL_RULE_NO_RECIPIENTS HTTP 409 Notification rule must have at least one recipient
    NOTIFICATION_RULES_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Notification rules count has reached the limit of 2

    Delete a Notification Rule

    Description Delete a notification rule.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Deleting event rule 'event_rule' will stop this event from sending alerts to mail / SNMP recipients
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/notifications/rules/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long The entity id of the rule
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "exclude_events": [
            "CLUSTER_MAPPED", 
            "CLUSTER_RENAMED"
        ], 
        "event_code": null, 
        "event_level": [
            "CRITICAL", 
            "ERROR"
        ], 
        "name": "syslog-rule1", 
        "target_parameters": {}, 
        "target_id": 5451, 
        "include_events": [
            "VOLUME_RESIZED", 
            "VOLUME_RESTORED"
        ], 
        "event_visibility": [], 
        "id": 5452
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Deleting event rule 'syslog-rule1' will stop this event from sending alerts to mail / SNMP recipients
    NOTIFICATION_RULE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Notification rule not found

    Description Get a notification rule by its ID.

    Roles ALL

    "metadata": {
        "ready": true

        "event_code": null, 
        "event_level": [
            "CRITICAL"
        ], 
        "name": "syslog-rule1", 
        "target_parameters": {}, 
        "target_id": 5082, 
        "include_events": [
            "VOLUME_RESIZED", 
            "VOLUME_RESTORED"
        ], 
        "event_visibility": [], 
        "id": 5083
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    NOTIFICATION_RULE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Notification rule not found

    Get the Notification Rules

    Description Get the notification rules that are defined in the InfiniBox.
    Filterable and Sortable fields:event_code,event_level,event_visibility,exclude_events,id,include_events,name.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/notifications/rules
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 4, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [
        {
            "exclude_events": [], 
            "event_code": null, 
            "event_level": [
                "CRITICAL", 
                "WARNING", 
                "ERROR"
            ], 
            "name": "default-infinidat-rule", 
            "target_parameters": {
                "recipients": [
                    "callhome@infinidat.com"
                ]
            }, 
            "target_id": 917, 
            "include_events": [], 
            "event_visibility": [
                "INFINIDAT"
            ], 
            "id": 919
        }, 
        {
            "exclude_events": [], 
            "event_code": "HEARTBEAT", 
            "event_level": [], 
            "name": "heartbeat-infinidat-rule", 
            "target_parameters": {
                "recipients": [
                    "callhome@infinidat.com"
                ]
            }, 
            "target_id": 917, 
            "include_events": [
                "HPT_HEARTBEAT", 
                "SYSTEM_SENSORS", 
                "INFINIMETRICS_HEARTBEAT", 
                "SA_HARDWARE_COLLECTOR", 
                "SYSTEM_METADATA", 
                "DRIVES_PHY_MONITOR", 
                "HEARTBEAT"
            ], 
            "event_visibility": [
                "INFINIDAT"
            ], 
            "id": 920
        }, 
        {
            "exclude_events": [
                "CLUSTER_MAPPED", 
                "CLUSTER_RENAMED"
            ], 
            "event_code": null, 
            "event_level": [
                "CRITICAL", 
                "ERROR"
            ], 
            "name": "auto-syslog-rule1-72da8781", 
            "target_parameters": {}, 
            "target_id": 931, 
            "include_events": [
                "VOLUME_RESIZED", 
                "VOLUME_RESTORED"
            ], 
            "event_visibility": [], 
            "id": 933
        }, 
        {
            "exclude_events": [
                "CLUSTER_MAPPED", 
                "CLUSTER_RENAMED"
            ], 
            "event_code": null, 
            "event_level": [
                "CRITICAL", 
                "ERROR"
            ], 
            "name": "auto-syslog-rule2-d3ddda1b", 
            "target_parameters": {}, 
            "target_id": 931,

}

    Update a Notification Rule Attribute

    Description Update an attribute of the notification rule.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/notifications/rules/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long The entity id of the rule
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "target_id": 5050
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "exclude_events": [
            "CLUSTER_MAPPED", 
            "CLUSTER_RENAMED"
        ], 
        "event_code": null, 
        "event_level": [
            "CRITICAL"
        ], 
        "name": "syslog-rule1", 
        "target_parameters": {}, 
        "target_id": 5082, 
        "include_events": [
            "VOLUME_RESIZED", 
            "VOLUME_RESTORED"
        ], 
        "event_visibility": [], 
        "id": 5083
    }, 
    "error": null
}

    MALFORMED_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request content is malformed
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value ([bar]) of parameter 'foo' does not meet a condition: 'recipients'
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('recipients') could not be translated to an expected type
    NOTIFICATION_RULE_VISIBILITY_FORBIDDEN HTTP 403 The notification target is visible by all users
    NOTIFICATION_RULE_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Notification rule not found
    ILLEGAL_NOTIFICATION_RULE_DATA HTTP 409 Illegal notification rule data: A notification rule cannot both include and exclude the same event
    INCLUDE_EXCLUDE_EVENTS_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 The notification rule cannot be created as the maximum number of included and/or excluded event was exceeded

    Notification Target

    Create a Notification Target

    Description Create a notification target.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/notifications/targets
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "protocol": "SYSLOG", 
    "name": "auto-syslog-target-16ce8f8", 
    "facility": "LOCAL7", 
    "visibility": "CUSTOMER", 
    "id": 0, 
    "host": "auto-syslog-host-660c2fba-", 
    "port": 8080, 
    "transport": "TCP"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "protocol": "SYSLOG", 
        "name": "auto-syslog-target-16ce8f8", 
        "facility": "LOCAL7", 
        "visibility": "CUSTOMER", 
        "id": 238, 
        "host": "auto-syslog-host-660c2fba-", 
        "port": 8080, 
        "transport": "TCP"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (GGiwuSmVeWYbFeOJtWdCsfBCNmxkDXWKQoAMBRPYynKCOwxjCLnuRxogpwBDdgoBFGJvkPfBPeNlnkdNpXOMUqAENFcSMMKkcTaqerlrfSvjyFqUkaKwNVwiYJAXpYJXlnFuqTRQfovXsCxBpUufQrxBFsoiCpiqidRSneFoANkdSIxVPSmXlxCNKHoHHGRSmVBDqNlJyLGvjuTxetXWrWcdBaOeVHkPYncwSIAxsvcLlRKjsmHBXJoqsQfJoybXnnpQhfrlHbVWcEhhicfTMHKMxngpLAkgaixoOyFfwuJb.com) of parameter 'host' does not meet a condition: 'size must be between 3 and 255'
    INVALID_NAME_LENGTH HTTP 400 Name must be of length between 1 and 65 characters
    INVALID_PASSWORD HTTP 400 Password length must be between 1 and 32 characters
    MISSING_FIELD HTTP 400 A field ('authProtocol') is missing in an object passed
    NOTIFICATION_TARGETS_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Notification targets count has reached the limit of 2
    SMTP_TARGET_CREATE_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 Creating a new SMTP target is not allowed
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_NOT_APPLICABLE HTTP 409 User not authorized to perform Infinidat target related operations
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_CONFLICT HTTP 409 A Notification Target SNMP with host 'snmp-host' and port 8080 already exists
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 A Notification Target with this name already exists

    Delete a Notification Target

    Description Delete a notification target
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Deleting SNMP Target 'snmp_target' will stop SNMP alerts from being sent to this host
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/notifications/targets/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the notification target
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "engine": null, 
        "username": null, 
        "protocol": "SNMP", 
        "name": "target1", 
        "private_protocol": null, 
        "visibility": "CUSTOMER", 
        "id": 5435, 
        "auth_protocol": null, 
        "host": "auto-snmp-host-7196c36b-e6", 
        "version": "SNMPV2C", 
        "community": null, 
        "auth_type": "NOAUTHNOPRIV", 
        "port": 8080
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Deleting SNMP Target 'target1' will stop SNMP alerts from being sent to this host
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_ACTIVE HTTP 403 Notification target 'target1' cannot be deleted because it is used by notification rules
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Notification target not found
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_NOT_APPLICABLE HTTP 409 User not authorized to perform Infinidat target related operations
    SMTP_TARGET_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED HTTP 409 Deleting an SMTP target is not allowed

    Testing the Notification Target After Creating It

    Description Test the notification target by sending a dummy event.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/notifications/targets/{id}/test
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the notification target
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "r": "a@b.com"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": true, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    MISSING_CONTENT HTTP 400 The request is empty
    EMAIL_INVALID_RECIPIENT HTTP 400 Invalid email address: 'aaaa'
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('recipients') could not be translated to an expected type
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('r')

    Testing the Notification Target Before Creating It

    Description Test the notification target by sending a dummy event.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/notifications/targets/test
    URL Parameters none
    JSON Data none
    Returns
    Errors See general list of error codes.
    No request examples available

    Update a Notification Target Attribute

    Description Update the attributes of a notification target.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/notifications/targets/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the notification target
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "host": "cFWxqOIkvwpFwiFbClPYFNbSrutRKGmAdROuPTlQsTYhdguqCMQtBMpNbAjhDmFGWohiEkFiUvjTivJexTELdBcrxdJCVamBigUHGgqRaItFQmDdAdcRldkFmkqdToYYEGOQSAVWfEWdIOtjGPxMJWmfMMEHlEdJRgDwHAPbaGhlhUlmwNOpqWDtYSeXfWGlLdciqDOnlCHeWwTvdrhvDPUsWXcpIOGfHhTOcGCxjxNMOEyYjmuOYmRnntgyEysltXavXrvFaaXpEljcAdfcEJRKXSYEgKtgtBQffRANBdQa.com"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "protocol": "SYSLOG", 
        "name": "syslog-target1", 
        "facility": "LOCAL7", 
        "visibility": "CUSTOMER", 
        "id": 4851, 
        "host": "syslog.infinidat.com", 
        "port": 8080, 
        "transport": "TCP"
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (cFWxqOIkvwpFwiFbClPYFNbSrutRKGmAdROuPTlQsTYhdguqCMQtBMpNbAjhDmFGWohiEkFiUvjTivJexTELdBcrxdJCVamBigUHGgqRaItFQmDdAdcRldkFmkqdToYYEGOQSAVWfEWdIOtjGPxMJWmfMMEHlEdJRgDwHAPbaGhlhUlmwNOpqWDtYSeXfWGlLdciqDOnlCHeWwTvdrhvDPUsWXcpIOGfHhTOcGCxjxNMOEyYjmuOYmRnntgyEysltXavXrvFaaXpEljcAdfcEJRKXSYEgKtgtBQffRANBdQa.com) of parameter 'host' does not meet a condition: 'size must be between 3 and 255'
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('protocol')
    INVALID_PARAMETER_LENGTH HTTP 400 Parameter ('subject_prefix') length must be between 0 and 255 characters. Actual: 256
    UPDATE_SNMP_VERSION HTTP 400 Updating the SNMP target version is not allowed. Delete the target and create a new one
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: insufficient privileges
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 A Notification Target with this name already exists
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_CONFLICT HTTP 409 A Notification Target SNMP with host 'snmp-host' and port 8080 already exists

    Update Notification Target Entity

    Description Update multiple attributes of a notification target
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/notifications/targets/{id}/update_entity
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the notification target
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "host": "new-host-name", 
    "name": "target-new-name", 
    "port": 8081
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "engine": null, 
        "username": "username", 
        "protocol": "SNMP", 
        "name": "target-new-name", 
        "private_protocol": null, 
        "visibility": "CUSTOMER", 
        "id": 4836, 
        "auth_protocol": null, 
        "host": "new-host-name", 
        "version": "SNMPV2C", 
        "community": null, 
        "auth_type": null, 
        "port": 8081
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (*********************************************************************************************************************************) of parameter 'password' does not meet a condition: 'size must be between 0 and 128'
    UPDATE_SNMP_VERSION HTTP 400 Updating the SNMP target version is not allowed. Delete the target and create a new one
    NOTIFICATION_TARGET_CONFLICT HTTP 409 A Notification Target SNMP with host 'snmp-host' and port 8080 already exists

    Pdu

    Get all Pdus

    Description Return Racks' pdus
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/components/racks/{rackId}/pdus
    URL Parameters none
    JSON Data none
    Returns
    Errors See general list of error codes.
    No request examples available

    Get Pdu by ID

    Description Return pdu by id
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/components/racks/{rackId}/pdus/{pduIdx}
    URL Parameters
    pduIdx int The pdu id
    Roles INFINIDAT,  TECHNICIAN,  POOL_ADMIN,  READ_ONLY,  ADMIN
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "state_description": "", 
        "vendor": "OK", 
        "power_ports": [
            {
                "role": "Outlet", 
                "component_id": "system.racks[1].pdu[1].power_ports[1]", 
                "port_num": 1, 
                "conn_port_comp_id": "ats1:power_ports2"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "Outlet", 
                "component_id": "system.racks[1].pdu[1].power_ports[2]", 
                "port_num": 2, 
                "conn_port_comp_id": "enclosure1:power_ports1"
            }, 
            {
                "role": "Outlet", 
                "component_id": "system.racks[1].pdu[1].power_ports[3]", 
                "port_num": 3, 
                "conn_port_comp_id": ""
            }, 
            {
                "role": "Outlet", 
                "component_id": "system.racks[1].pdu[1].power_ports[4]",

            {
                "role": "Outlet", 
                "component_id": "system.racks[1].pdu[1].power_ports[6]",

                "conn_port_comp_id": ""

                "role": "Outlet",

    Errors See general list of error codes.

    Plugin

    Create a Plugin

    Description Create a new plugin.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/plugins
    URL Parameters none
    Roles INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "name": "auto-plugin--8cc83c73-47fb", 
    "max_sec_without_heartbeat": 60, 
    "api_redirect_suffix": "autoapiredirectsuffix477/", 
    "version": "DefaultVersion", 
    "tenant_id": 232, 
    "management_url": "http://example.com/DefaultApiRedirectSuffix", 
    "type": "DefaultType"
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "capacity": {
            "allocated_physical_space": 0, 
            "allocated_virtual_space": 0, 
            "total_physical_capacity": 0, 
            "total_virtual_capacity": 0
        }, 
        "name": "auto-plugin--8cc83c73-47fb", 
        "management_url": "http://example.com/DefaultApiRedirectSuffix", 
        "created_at": 1639516478853, 
        "heartbeat_valid": false, 
        "updated_at": 1639516478853, 
        "api_redirect_suffix": "autoapiredirectsuffix477/", 
        "version": "DefaultVersion", 
        "tenant_id": 232, 
        "max_sec_without_heartbeat": 60, 
        "heartbeat": null, 
        "last_heartbeat": null, 
        "type": "DefaultType", 
        "id": 233
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    INVALID_NAME_LENGTH HTTP 400 Name must be of length between 1 and 65 characters
    MISSING_FIELD HTTP 400 A field ('tenant_id') is missing in an object passed
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (1) of parameter 'max_sec_without_heartbeat' does not meet a condition: 'must be greater than or equal to 31'
    PLUGIN_INVALID_MANAGEMENT_URL HTTP 400 Management URL 'abc' is not a valid URL
    PLUGIN_INVALID_REDIRECT_SUFFIX HTTP 400 Redirect suffix 'a b/' is invalid: Must be alphanumeric ending with a '/'
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: Method is not allowed for TECHNICIAN
    API_REDIRECT_SUFFIX_IS_ALREADY_USED HTTP 409 Plugin 'auto-plugin--07122645-5f1f' cannot use api redirect suffix 'b/' because it is already used by another plugin 'a'
    TENANT_HAS_PLUGIN HTTP 409 Tenant already manages the plugin 'auto-plugin--eb3af7a9-95bd', and can manage one plugin at most
    PLUGIN_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 A plugin with this name 'a' already exists
    PLUGIN_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Plugin count limit reached (1)

    Delete a Plugin

    Description Delete a plugin.
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/plugins/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the plugin
    Roles INFINIDAT
    System States ALL

        "ready": true
    },

        "updated_at": 1639516478853,

    PLUGIN_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Plugin not found

    Description Send a heartbeat for a plugin
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/plugins/{id}/heartbeat
    URL Parameters

    Roles INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "health_state": null, 
        "entity_counts": null
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    PLUGIN_INVALID_HEARTBEAT HTTP 400 Plugin's heartbeat is invalid: HealthState contains more than 10 messages
    PLUGIN_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Plugin not found

    Description Update an attribute of a plugin.
    API Endpoint PUT api/rest/plugins/{id}
    URL Parameters

    Roles INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data

    "api_redirect_suffix": "newvalue/"
}
    Returns

    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "capacity": {
            "allocated_physical_space": 0, 
            "allocated_virtual_space": 0, 
            "total_physical_capacity": 0, 
            "total_virtual_capacity": 0
        }, 
        "name": "auto-plugin--08d216a3-9aa9", 
        "management_url": "http://example.com/DefaultApiRedirectSuffix", 
        "created_at": 1639516482705, 
        "heartbeat_valid": false, 
        "updated_at": 1639516482903, 
        "api_redirect_suffix": "newvalue/", 
        "version": "DefaultVersion", 
        "tenant_id": 264, 
        "max_sec_without_heartbeat": 60, 
        "heartbeat": null, 
        "last_heartbeat": null, 
        "type": "DefaultType", 
        "id": 265
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('type')
    PLUGIN_INVALID_MANAGEMENT_URL HTTP 400 Management URL 'abc' is not a valid URL
    PLUGIN_INVALID_REDIRECT_SUFFIX HTTP 400 Redirect suffix 'a b/' is invalid: Must be alphanumeric ending with a '/'
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: Method is not allowed for TECHNICIAN
    API_REDIRECT_SUFFIX_IS_ALREADY_USED HTTP 409 Plugin 'auto-plugin--9281f19b-8446' cannot use api redirect suffix 'autoapiredirectsuffix8d8/' because it is already used by another plugin 'auto-plugin--28862830-6d65'

    Pool

    Create a Pool

    Description Create a new pool.
    API Endpoint POST api/rest/pools
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data 
    {
    "virtual_capacity": 1000000000000, 
    "max_extend": -1, 
    "name": "auto-pool--a0c79922-72fa-4", 
    "physical_capacity": 1000000000000
}
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "volumes_count": 0, 
        "updated_at": 1639516098037, 
        "max_extend": -1, 
        "allocated_physical_space": 0, 
        "free_virtual_space": 1000000192512, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "reserved_capacity": 100000000000, 
        "filesystems_count": 0, 
        "ssd_enabled": true, 
        "snapshots_count": 0, 
        "state": "NORMAL", 
        "type": "STANDARD", 
        "free_physical_space": 1000000192512, 
        "entities_count": 0, 
        "owners": [], 
        "capacity_savings": null, 
        "name": "auto-pool--a0c79922-72fa-4", 
        "virtual_capacity": 1000000192512, 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516098037, 
        "filesystem_snapshots_count": 0, 
        "compression_enabled": true, 
        "qos_policies": [], 
        "physical_capacity_warning": 80, 
        "physical_capacity": 1000000192512, 
        "physical_capacity_critical": 90
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (null) of parameter 'type' does not meet a condition: 'may not be null'
    INVALID_CHARACTERS_IN_NAME HTTP 400 Invalid characters in name 'auto-invalid*name-9f74b2bd'
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('physical_capacity') could not be translated to an expected type
    MISSING_FIELD HTTP 400 A field ('physical_capacity') is missing in an object passed
    ILLEGAL_THRESHOLD_VALUE HTTP 400 Illegal threshold value: 101
    INVALID_NAME_LENGTH HTTP 400 Name must be of length between 1 and 65 characters
    UNSUPPORTED_FIELD HTTP 400 The request contains an unsupported field ('state')
    USER_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 User not found
    ILLEGAL_POOL_CAPACITY HTTP 409 The requested capacity is not allowed. Reason: Pool size is not aligned with integral units of 512. Wrong capacity value: 1000GB
    POOL_NAME_CONFLICT HTTP 409 An entity with this name already exists
    SYSTEM_VIRTUAL_CAPACITY HTTP 409 Used virtual space reached system virtual capacity
    POOL_COUNT_LIMIT HTTP 409 Pool cannot be created as the maximum number of pools exceeded
    ILLEGAL_WARNING_OR_CRITICAL_VALUE HTTP 409 Illegal value 80. Critical value (70) must be greater than warning value (80)
    ILLEGAL_POOL_ADMIN HTTP 409 A non-POOL_ADMIN user cannot be assigned as a pool admin

    Delete a Pool

    Description Delete a pool.
    Approval required This is a dangerous operation
    Deleting pool 'pool_name' might prevent the pool's administrator from creating new datasets
    API Endpoint DELETE api/rest/pools/{id}
    URL Parameters
    id long ID of the pool
    Roles ADMIN,  INFINIDAT
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true
    }, 
    "result": {
        "volumes_count": 0, 
        "updated_at": 1639516128298, 
        "max_extend": -1, 
        "allocated_physical_space": 0, 
        "free_virtual_space": 1000000192512, 
        "id": 1000, 
        "reserved_capacity": 100000000000, 
        "filesystems_count": 0, 
        "ssd_enabled": true, 
        "snapshots_count": 0, 
        "state": "NORMAL", 
        "type": "STANDARD", 
        "free_physical_space": 1000000192512, 
        "entities_count": 0, 
        "owners": [], 
        "capacity_savings": null, 
        "name": "auto-pool--c6a3f8fc-0151-4", 
        "virtual_capacity": 1000000192512, 
        "tenant_id": 1, 
        "created_at": 1639516128298, 
        "filesystem_snapshots_count": 0, 
        "compression_enabled": true, 
        "qos_policies": [], 
        "physical_capacity_warning": 80, 
        "physical_capacity": 1000000192512, 
        "physical_capacity_critical": 90
    }, 
    "error": null
}
    Errors
    UNAUTHORIZED HTTP 403 You are not authorized for this operation, reason: insufficient privileges
    APPROVAL_REQUIRED HTTP 403 Deleting pool 'auto-pool--32d9c1e5-a4c8-4' might prevent the pool's administrator from creating new datasets
    POOL_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Pool not found
    ENTITY_ASSIGNED_TO_QOS HTTP 409 The pool 'auto-pool--09267832-216d-4' is assigned to QoS policy 'auto-QoSPolicy4Test-4c5f4e' and cannot be deleted
    POOL_NOT_EMPTY HTTP 409 Pool is not empty
    POOL_HAS_CG HTTP 409 Pool has consistency groups

    Description Get an attribute of a pool.

    attribute String The name of the attribute to return
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 0, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [], 
    "error": null
}
    Errors

    POOL_NOT_FOUND HTTP 404 Pool not found

    Get all Pools

    Description Get all of the pools.
    Filterable and Sortable fields:compression_enabled,created_at,id,name,ssd_enabled,type,updated_at.
    API Endpoint GET api/rest/pools
    URL Parameters none
    Roles ALL
    System States ALL
    JSON Data none
    Returns 
    {
    "metadata": {
        "ready": true, 
        "number_of_objects": 1, 
        "pages_total": 1, 
        "page": 1, 
        "page_size": 50
    }, 
    "result": [
        {
            "volumes_count": 0, 
            "updated_at": 1639516197100, 
            "max_extend": -1, 
            "allocated_physical_space": 0, 
            "free_virtual_space": 1000000192512, 
            "id": 1000, 
            "reserved_capacity": 100000000000, 
            "filesystems_count": 0, 
            "ssd_enabled": true, 
            "snapshots_count": 0, 
            "state": "NORMAL", 
            "type": "STANDARD", 
            "free_physical_space": 1000000192512, 
            "entities_count": 0, 
            "owners": [], 
            "capacity_savings": null, 
            "name": "auto-pool--40ef75fc-67d2-4", 
            "virtual_capacity": 1000000192512, 
            "tenant_id": 1, 
            "created_at": 1639516197100, 
            "filesystem_snapshots_count": 0, 
            "compression_enabled": true, 
            "qos_policies": [], 
            "physical_capacity_warning": 80, 
            "physical_capacity": 1000000192512, 
            "physical_capacity_critical": 90

    ], 
    "error": null
}

    WRONG_PARAMETER HTTP 400 The value (-1) of parameter 'page' does not meet a condition: 'int >= 1'
    MALFORMED_PARAMETER HTTP 400 A parameter ('page') could not be translated to an expected type
    UNSUPPORTED_FILTER_RELATION HTTP 400 The filtering operator 'ALLOF' is not supported by this resource
    AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED HTTP 401 The operation requires authentication

    System States ALL

        "ready": true,

            "allocated_physical_space": 0, 
            "free_virtual_space": 1000000192512, 
            "id": 1000, 
            "reserved_capacity": 100000000000, 
            "filesystems_count": 0,
